content.p: Poresidente o tshwanelwa ke go rebola le go saena Molaotlhomo o o fetisitsweng go ya ka kgaolo e, kgotsa fa Poresidente a na le dipelaelo ka ga bomolaotheo ba Molaotlhomo, o o busetsa morago go Kokoano Bosetšhaba go sekwasekwa sešwa.
Melawana e e tshwaraganetsweng e tshwanetse go neela thulaganyo go, le mokgwa wa, go tsaya karolo mo go sekasekeng sešwa ga molaotlhomo ke Kokoano Bosetšhaba le Khansele ya Bosetšhaba ya Diporofense.
Khansele ya Bosetšhaba ya Diporofense e tsaya karolo mo go sekasekiweng sešwa ga Molaotlhomo o Poresidente a o buseditseng morago go Kokoano Bosetšhaba fela fa –

item.p: go sa kgotsofale ga Poresidente ka bomolaotheo ba molaotlhomo bo golagana le morero wa botsamaisi jo bo amang Khansele; kgotsa
karolo 74(1),(2) kgotsa(3)(b) kgotsa 76 e ne e dira mo go fetisiweng ga Molaotlhomo.

content.p: Fa, morago ga kakanyo sešwa, Molaotlhomo o arabela dipelaelo tsa ga Poresidente ka botlalo, Poresidente o tshwanetse go rebola a ba a saena Molaotlhomo; go seng jalo, Poresidente o tshwanela ke go –

item.p: rebola a bo a saene Molaotlhomo; kgotsa
a o romele go kgotlatshekelo ya Molaotheo go tsaya tshwetso ka bomolaotheo ba ona.

content.p: Fa Kgotlatshekelo ya Molaotheo e swetsa gore Molaotlhomo o mo Molaotheong, Poresidente o tshwanela go o rebola le go o saena.

section.heading: Kopo ya ditokololo tsa Kokoano Bosetšhaba go Kgotlatshekelo ya Molaotheo

content.p: Ditokololo tsa Kokoano Bosetšhaba di ka dira kopo go Kgotlatshekelo ya Molaotheo go senka taelo e e atlholang gore Molao otlhe kgotsa karolo ya Molao, o o fetisitsweng ke Kokoano ga o ka fa molaotheong.
Kopo –

item.p: e tshwanetse ya tshegediwa ke bonnye nngwe-tharong ya ditokololo tsa Kokoano; e bile
e tshwanelwa go dirwa morago mo malatsing a le 30, go simolola fa Poresidente a rebola e bile a saena Molao;

content.p: Kgotlatshekelo ya Molaotheo e ka laela gore molao otlhe, kgotsa karolo eo e leng setlhogo sa kopo, ka mabaka a karolotlaleletso (1), ga e na matla go fitlha Kgotlatshekelo e tlhomamisa ka mokgwa mongwe, fa –

item.p: dikgatlhego tsa bosiamisi di tlhoka seo; le
fa kopo e na le tšhono ya go atlega.

content.p: Fa kopo e sa atlega, e bile e sena kgonagalo ya go atlega, Kgotlatshekelo ya Molaotheo e tshwanetse go laela bakopi go duela ditshenyegelo.

Molaotlhomo o amogetsweng le go saeniwa ke Moporesidente e nna Molao wa Palamente, e bile o tshwanetse go phasaladiwa ka bonako, mme o simolola go dira Morago ga go phatlalatswa, kgotsa ka motlha o tlhomamisitsweng go ya ka ditaelo tsa Molao.

Kgatiso e e amogetsweng ya Molao wa Palamente ke bopaki bo bo feleletseng jwa ditsamaiso tsa Molao oo e bile, morago ga phasalatso, o tshwanelwa go bewa mo polokesegong ya Kgotlatshekelo ya Molaotheo.
Moporesidente –

item.p: ke Tlhogo ya Naga e bile ke tlhogo ya khuduthamaga ya bosetšhaba;
o tshwanetse go obamela, go sireletsa le go tlotla Molaotheo jaaka molaomogolo wa Rephaboliki;
o godisa kopano ya setšhaba le ntshetsopele ya Rephaboliki.

content.p: Moporesidente o na le dithata go ya ka Molaotheo le molao, go akarediwa tse di tlhokegang go dira ditiro tsa Tlhogo ya Naga le tlhogo ya Khuduthamaga ya Bosetšhaba.
Moporesidente o rwele maikarabelo a –

item.p: go amogela le go saena Melaotlhomo;
go busetsa Molaotlhomo morago go Palamente gore o sekasekwe go tsamaelana le bomolaotheo;
go romela Molaotlhomo go Kgotlatshekelo ya Molaotheo go dira tshwetso ka bomolaotheo ba Molaotlhomo oo;
go bitsa kopana e e sa tlwaelegang ya Ntlokokoano Bosetšhaba, Khansele ya Bosetšhaba ya Diporofense kgotsa Palamente go sekaseka merero e e kgethegileng;

go thapa batho mo maemong a farologaneng go tsamaelana le ditlhokego tse di tshwanetseng go diriwa ke Moporesidente go ya ka Molaotheo kgotsa molao, ntle le jaaka e le tlhogo ya khuduthamaga ya bosetšhaba;
go tlhoma dikhomišene tsa dipatlisiso;
go goeletsa referentamo go ya ka Molao wa Palamente;
go amogela le go tlotla baemedi ba dinaga disele/didipolomate, le baemedi pharaphare;
go kgetha baambasatara; le baemedipuso, badipolomate le baemedi pharaphare go emela naga;
go tshwarela kgotsa go kgaolelwa le phokoletso ya kotlhao nngwe le nngwe ya tuelo, kgotsa go gapelwa thoto;
go aba diala tsa tlotlo.

p.remark: [Ntlhakakaretso: Ditebogo tsa tlotlo tse di tsentsweng mo Kuranteng ya Puso 24155 ya 6 Sedimont- hole, 2002 le mo Kuranteng ya Puso 25213 ya 25 Phukwi, 2003.]

content.p: Bothati taolo jwa Rephaboliki bo rwelwe ke Moporesidente.
Moporesidente o diragatsa taolo ya bokhuduthamaga, le ditokololo dingwe tsa Kabinete, ka –

item.p: go diragatsa molao wa bosetšhaba ntle le fa Molaotheo kgotsa Molao wa Palamente o tlhomamisitse ka mokgwa mongwe;
go tlhabolola le go diragatsa maikemisetso a bosetšhaba;
go rulaganya ditiro tsa mafapha a puso le tsamaiso;
go tshitsinya le go simolola molao;
go dira tiro nngwe le nngwe ya bokhuduthamaga e e tlhomamisitsweng ke Molaotheo kgotsa molao wa bosetšhaba.

content.p: Mo kopanong ya ntlha, morago ga ditlhopho fa go tshwanetse go tladiwa phatlha, Ntlokokoano Bosetšhaba e tshwanetse go kgetha monna kgotsa mosadi mo ditokololong tsa yona go nna Moporesidente.

Moatlhodimogolo o tshwanetse go okama ditlhopho pele go tlhophiwa Moporesidente kgotsa a kgethe Moatlhodi mongwe go dira jaalo. Go dirisiwa tsamaiso e e tlhalositsweng mo Karolo A ya Mametlelelo 3 fa go tlhophiwa Moporesidente.

p.remark: [Kl(2) e emetswe ke k. 6 Molaotheo Tlhabololo wa Borataro wa Molao wa 2001.]

content.p: Ditlhopho tsa go tlatsa phatlha mo kantorong ya Moporesidente di tshwanetse go tshwarwa ka nako le letlha le le kgethilweng ke Moatlhodimogolo, mme fela e seng morago ga matsatsi a le 30 morago ga tlhagelela ga phatlha.

p.remark: [Kl(3) e emetswe ke k. 6 ya Molaotheo Tlhabololo wa Borataro wa Molao wa 2001.]

content.p: Fa motho a tlhophilwe go nna Moporesidente o kgaotsa go nna tokololo ya Ntlokokoano Bosetšhaba o tshwanetse go simolola tiro mo nakong ya matsatsi a le matlhano(5) ka go ikana le go tshepisa boikanyego go Rephaboliki le go ikobela Molaotheo go ya ka Mametlelelo 2.
Paka ya tiro ya Boporesidente e simolola fa motho a simolola tiro mme e fela fa phatlha e tlhagelela kgotsa fa motho yo a tlhophilweng go mo tlhatlhama a simolola tiro.

Ga go motho ope yo o tshwanetseng go nna Moporesidente go feta dipaka di le pedi tsa tiro, mme fa mongwe a tlhophilwe go tlatsa phatlha ya Boporesidente, nako magareng ga ditlhopho le ditlhopho tse di latelang tsa Bopresidente, ga e tsewe e le paka ya tiro.
Ntlokokoano Bosetšhaba, ka tshegetso ya bonnye diboutu tsa pedi-tharo ya ditokololo tsa yona, e ka kgona go tlosa Moporesidente mo maemong a gagwe, fela ka ntlha ya mabaka a-

item.p: Tshiamololo e e masisi ya Molaotheo;
Maitshwaro a makgwakgwa;
Tlhokego ya bokgoni jwa go dira ditiro tsa gagwe.

content.p: Mongwe le mongwe yo o tlositsweng mo maemong a boporesidente go ya ka mabaka a 62 karolotlaleletso (1)(a) kgotsa (b) gag a tshwanela go amogela ditshwanelo tsa tiro ya maemo ao, e bile ga a tshwanela go dira jaaka motlhankedi wa setšhaba.

Fa Moporesidente a se teng mo nageng kgotsa a sa kgone go dira ditiro tsa kantoro ya boPoresidente kgotsa fa go nale phatlha mo kantorong ya Moporesidente, motlhankedi yo o na leng matla a go dira jaaka Poresidente go ya ka tatelano e fa tlase, ke:

item.p: Motlatsa Moporesidente.
Tona e e kgethilweng ke Moporesidente.
Tona e e kgethilweng ke ditokololo tse dingwe tsa Kabinete.
Mmusakgotla wa Palamente go fitlhelela Ntlokokoano Bosetšhaba e kgetha mongwe wa maloko a yona.

content.p: Moporesidente wa nama-o-tshwere o na le maikarabelo, maatla, le ditiro tsa Poresidente.

Pele a simolola ka maikarabelo, matla le ditiro tsa boPoresidente, Moporesidente wa nama-o-tshwere o tshwanetse go ikana kgotsa go tshepisa botshepegi go Rephaboliki le kobamelo ya Molaotheo, go ya ka Mametlelelo 2.

Motho yoo, jaaka Moporesidente wa nama-o-tshwere a ikanneng kgotsa a tshepisitseng botshepegi go Rephaboliki ga a tshwanela go ikana kgotsa go tshepisa gape botshepegi mo pakeng e e latelang jaaka Moporesidente wa nama- o-tshwere ka bokhutlo jwa paka fa motho yo o tlhophilweng a simoloal tiro jaaka Moporesidente.

p.remark: [Kl.(4) e tlaleleditswe ke k. 1 ya Molao ya Molaotheo Tlhabololo wa Borataro wa Molao wa 1997.]

content.p: Kabinete e bopilwe ke Moporesidente, jaaka tlhogo ya Kabinete, Motlatsa Moporesidente le Ditona.
Moporesidente o tlhopha Motlatsa Moporesidente le Ditona, o ba abela dithata le ditiro, e bile o kgona go ba tlogedisa tiro.
Moporesidente –

item.p: o tshwanetse go kgetha Motlatsa Moporesidente mo ditokololong tsa Ntlokokoano Bosetšhaba;
a ka kgetha palo nngwe le nngwe ya Ditona go tswa go ditokololo tsa Ntlokokoano Bosetšhaba;
a ka kgetha Ditona tse disa sa feteng palo ya pedi go tswa kwa ntle ga Ntlokokoano.

content.p: Moporesidente o tshwanetse go kgetha tokololo ya Kabinete go nna moeteledipele wa merero ya puso mo Ntlokokoano Bosetšhaba.
Motlatsa Moporesidente o tshwanetse go thusa Moporesidente go dira ditiro tsa puso.
Motlatsa Moporesidente le Ditona ba rwele maikarabelo a dithata le ditiro tsa khuduthamaga tse ba di abetsweng ke Moporesidente.
Ditokololo tsa Kabinete di na le maikarabelo ka bojotlhe le ka bonngwe go Palamente go diragatsa tsa ditiro tsa bona.
Ditokololo tsa Kabinete di tshwanetse –

item.p: go dira go ya ka Molaotheo;
go neela Palamente dipegelo ka botlalo nako le nako tebang le merero e e mo taolong ya bona.

content.p: Moporesidente a ka tlhopha-

item.p: Batlatsa Ditona go tswa mo ditokololong tsa Ntlokokoano Bosetšhaba; le
Ga go a tshwanelwa go tlhopha Batlatsa Ditona ba ba fetang pedi go tswa kwa ntle ga Ntlokokoano Bosetšhaba, go thusa ditokololo tsa Kabinete, e bile a ka ba koba mo tirong.

content.p: Batlatsa Ditona ba ba tlhophilweng go ya ka karolotlaleletso (1)(b) ba ka fa tlase ga taolo ya Palamente go diragatsa dithata tsa bona le ditiro tsa bona.

p.remark: [K. 93 e emetswe ke k. 7 ya Molaotheo Tlhabololo wa Borataro wa Molao wa 2001.]

section.heading: Go tswelelapele ga Kabinete morago ga ditlhopho

content.p: Fa go tshwerwe ditlhopho tsa Ntlokokoano Bosetšhaba, Kabinete, Motlatsa- Moporesidente, Ditona le Batlatsa Ditona ba na le tetla ya go dira go fitlhelela motho yo tlhophilweng jaaka Moporesidente ke Ntlokokoano e e latelang a simolola go dira.

Pele Motlatsa Moporesidente, Ditona le Moatlatsa Tona nngwe le nngwe a simolola go dira tiro ya bona, o tshwanetse go ikana kgotsa go tshepisa go nna le boikanyego go Rephaboliki le go obamela Molaotheo go ya ka Mametlelelo 2.

section.heading: Maitsholo a Ditokololo tsa Kabinete le Batlatsa Ditona

content.p: Ditokololo tsa Kabinete le Batlatsa Ditona ba tshwanela go itshwara go tsamaelana le khoutu ya maitshwaro e e tlhomamisistweng ke molao wa bosetšhaba.
Ditokololo tsa Kabinete le Batlatsa Ditona gab a tshwanela, go –

item.p: dira tiro nngwe e e duelang;

itshwara ka mokgwa mongwe o o kgatlhanong le maemo a tiro ya bona, kgotsa go ipaya mo maemong a a na leng kotsi kotsi ya go tlhoal kgotlhang garen ga maikarabelo a bona a semmuso le dikgatlhagelo tsa poraefete.

content.p: Ka kgoeletso MoPoresidente a ka abela tokololo ya Kabinete –

item.p: tsamaiso ya molao mongwe le mongwe o o neng o abetsweng tokololo e nngwe; kgotsa
thata kgotsa tiro nngwe le nngwe e e neng e abetswe tokololo e nngwe ka molao.

content.p: Moporesidente a ka abela tokololo ya Kabinete thata kgotsa tiro ya tokololo nngwe e e se yong mo tirong kgotsa e e sa kgoneng go diragatsa maatla ao, kgotsa tiro eo.

Tokololo ya Kabinete e ka abela tokololo nngwe le nngwe ya Kgotla ya Khuduthamaga ya porofense kgotsa go Khansele ya Mmasepala thata kgotsa tiro nngwe le nngwe e e tshwanetseng go diriwa go tsamaelana le Molao wa Palamente. Tiro –

item.p: e tshwanela go diriwa ka tumelelano gare ga tokololo ya Kabinete e e maleba le Mokhuduthamaga oo, kgotsa tokololo ya Khansele ya Mmasepala;
e e diriwang kgotsa matla ao, a tshwanetse go tsamaelana le Molao wa Palamente;
e simolola go diriwa Morago ga phatlalatso ya kgoeletso ke Moporesidente.

section.heading: Thuso ya bosetšhaba go tsamaiso ya diporofense

content.p: Fa porofense e retelelwa kgotsa e sa dire ditshwanelo tsa yona go ya ka molao kgotsa Molaotheo, khuduthamaga ya bosetšhaba e ka tsereganya ka go tsaya dikgato tse di maleba go netefatsa ntshetsopele ya ditshwanelo eo, go akarediwa –

item.p: go ntsha taelo go khuduthamaga ya porofense, e e tlhalosang selekano sa go palelelwa go dira tiro ya yona le tlhaloso ya dikgato tse di tlhokeganggo dira tiro eo; le
go tsaya maikarabelo tebang le tiro ya porofense ka moo go tlhokegang go –
netefatsa maemo a a botlhokwa a tekanyetso ya bosetšhaba kgotsa go fitlhelela maemo a tlhomamisitsweng a tekanyetso ya bosetšhaba go fitlhelela tiro eo;
netefatsa kgolo ya moruo; 66
netefatsa tshireletso ya setšhaba; kgotsa
kganela porofense eo go tsaya kgato e tla kgobelelang kgatlhego ya porofense e nngwe kgotsa ya naga ka bophara.

p.remark: [Kl.(1) e tlhabolotswe ke k. 2(b) ya Molaotheo Tlhabololo wa Bosomenngwe wa Molao wa 2003.]

content.p: Fa khuduthamaga ya bosetšhaba e thusa mo porofenseng go ya ka mabaka a karolotlaleletso (1)(b)–

item.p: e tshwanetse go kwala kitsiso e e tlhalosang mokgwa wa tsereganyo wa Khansele ya Bosetšhaba ya diporofense mo nakong ya matsatsi a le 14morago ga tshimologo ya tsereganyo;

tsereganyo e tshwanela go emisiwa fa Khansele e sa amogele thuso eo mo nakong ya matsatsi a le 180 morago ga tshimologo ya tsereganyo kgotsa fa ka nako ya bokhutlo jwa paka eo e se e amogela thuso eo, gape
fa tsereganyo e ntse e tswelelapele Khansele e tshwanetse go sekaseka maemo gangwe le gape le go rebolela khuduthamaga ya bosetšhaba ditshwaelo tse di maleba.

p.remark: [Kl.(2) e emetswe ke k. 2(c) ya Molaotheo Tlhabololo wa Bosomenngwe wa Molao wa 2003.]

content.p: Molao wa bosetšhaba o tshwanetse go rulaganya tsamaiso e e tlhomamisitsweng mo karolong eno.

p.remark: [K. 100 e tlhabolotswe ke k. 2(a) ya Molaotheo Tlhabololo wa Bosomenngwe wa Molao wa 2003.]

content.p: Tshwetso ya Moporesidente e tshwanetse go kwadiwa fa fatshe, fa –

item.p: e tsamaelana molao; kgotsa
e na le ditlamorago tsa semolao.

content.p: Tshwetso e e kwadilweng ya Moporesidente e tshwanetse go saeniwa ke tokololo nngwe gape ya Kabinete, fa tshwetso eo e ama tiro e e abetsweng tokololo eo ya Kabinete.
Dikgoeletso, melawana le didiriswa tse dingwe tsa melawana e e maleba di tshwanetse go fitlhelelwa ke botlhe.
Molao wa bosetšhaba o tshwanetse go totobatsa mokgwa o ka ona, le selekano seo, didiriswa tse di umakilweng mo karolotlaletso (3) di tshwanetseng go –

item.p: tlhagisiwa mo Palamenteng; le
go amogelwa ke Palamente.

content.p: Fa Ntlokokoano Bosetšhaba ka boutu ya bontsi jwa ditokololo e atlenegisa tshitshinyo ya go tlhoka boikanyego go Kabinete, ntle le Moporesidente, Moporesidente o tshwanetse go tlhopa Kabinete sešwa.

Fa Ntlokokoano Bosetšhaba ka boutu ya bontsi jwa ditokololo e atlanegisa tshitshinyo ya go tlhoka boikanyego go Moporesidente, Moporesidente le ditokololo tsa Kabinete le Batlatsa Ditona mongwe le mongwe ba tshwanetse go tlogela tiro.
Rephaboliki e na le diporofense tse di latelang:

item.p: Kapa Botlhaba;
Foreistata;
Gauteng;
Kwa Zulu-Natal;
Mpumalanga;
Kapa Bokone;
Limpopo;
Bokone Bophirima;
Kapa Bophirima.

p.remark: [K. 1 e emetswe ke k. 3 ya Molaotheo Tlhabololo wa Bosomenngwe wa Molao wa 2003.]

content.p: Mafelo a diporofense ka go farologana a akaretsa palo ya mafelo a tlhagelelang mo dimmepeng ka go farologana tse di tlhalositsweng mo Kitsisong ya Mametlelelo ya A1.

p.remark: [K.l (2) e emetswe ke k. 1 ya Molaotheo Tlhabololo wa Bosomepedi wa Molao wa 2005.]

item.p: Gangwe le gape fa kgaolo ya porofense e tlhomamisiwa sešwa ka tlhabololo ya Molaotheo, Molao wa Palamente o tshwanetse go tlamela ka tsamaiso ya thulaganyo mo nakong e sa fediseng pelo, bomolao, kgonagalo le ditlamorago dingwe tse di ka tlholwang ke thulaganyo entshwa.

Molao wa Palamente o o tlhomamisistweng mo temana (a) o ka atlenegisiwa le go tsenngwa tirisong pele tlhabololo eo e diriwa go Molaotheo, mmfela iro ngwe le ngwe ya porofense, dithoto, ditshwanelo, ditlamego,ditiro kgotsa maikarabelo a tshwanetse go sutisewa fela go ya ka Molaooo morago ga go tsengwa tirisong ga tlhabololo ya Molaotheo.

p.remark: [K. 103 e emetswe ke k. 1 ya Molaotheo Tlhabololo ya Bosomepedi ya Molao wa 2005.]

section.heading: Bothati taolo jwa dikgotla-peomolao tsa diporofense

content.p: Bothati taolo jwa porofense bo rwelwe kgotla-peomolao ya porofense, e bile bo naya kgotla-peomolao ya porofense maatla –

item.p: go atlanegisa molaotheo wa porofense kgotsa go tlhabolola molaotheo o o atlenegisitsweng ke yona, go ya ka ditaelo tsa dikarolo 142 le 143;
go atlenegisa molao boemong jwa porofense tebang le –
morero mongwe le mongwe o o tlhalositsweng mo lenaane la Mametlelelo 4;
morero mongwe le mongwe o o tlhalositsweng mo lenaane la Mametlelelo 5; le
morero mongwe le mongwe yo o sa tlhalosiwang mo manaaneong ao, o o abetsweng porofense ka tlhamalalo go ya ka molao wa bosetšhaba; le
morero mongwe le mongwe oo taelo ya Molaotheo e tlhomamisitseng katlanegiso ya kgotla-peomolao ya porofense; le
go abela Khansele ya Mmasepala nngwe le nngwe ya dithata tsa yona tsa semolao.

content.p: Kgotla-peomolao ya porofense, ka tshwetso ya bontsi jwa pedi-tharo ya ditokololo tsa yona, e ka, lopa Palamente go fetola leina la porofense eo.

Kgotla-Peomolao ya porofense e tlamiwa fela ke Molaotheo, le ke Molaotheo wa porofense fa e setse e atlanegisitse Molaotheo wa porofense, mme e tshwanetse go dira go ya ka ditaelo tsa Molaotheo oo, le molaotheo wa porofense eo.

kgotla-Peomolao ya porofense tebang le morero yo botlhokwa mabapi le, kgotsa wa tlaleletso le tiragatso ya thata ka manontlhotlho tebang le morero mongwe le mongwe o o mo lenaane la Mametlelelo 4, ke peo ka mabaka otlhe go ya ka lenaane la Mametlelelo 4.

Kgotla-peomolao ya porofense e ka dira tshitsinyo go Ntlokokoano Bosetšhaba ya molao tebang le morero mongwe le mongwe o o kwa ntle ga bothati taolo jwa kgotla-peomolao, kgotsa e okamweng ke Molao wa Palamente godimo ga molao wa porofense.

section.heading: Sebopego le ditlhopho tsa dikgotla-peomolao tsa Diporofense

content.p: Kgotla-peomolao tsa porofense di bopiwa ke basadi le banna ba ba tlhophilweng jaaka ditokololo tsa lenaane la tsamaiso ya ditlhopho, e –

item.p: tlhamiwang ka molao ya bosetšhaba;
ikaegileng ka karolo ya lenaane la batlhophi ba Porofense eo; le
rulaganyang bonnye selekanyetso sa go bouta sa dingwaga di le 18; le
dipholo, ka kakaretso, ka tekanyetso ya baemedi.

p.remark: [K.(1) e tlhabolotswe ke k. 3 ya Molaotheo Tlhabololo ya Bolesome ya Molao wa 2003 le ka k. 3 ya Molaotheo Tlhabololo ya Bosomenne ya Molao wa 2008.]

content.p: Kgotla-peomolao ya porofense e na le ditokololo tse di le gare ga 30 le 80. Palo ya ditokololo e ka farologana go ya ka diporofense fa seo se rulagantswe ka selekanyo sa mokgwa o tlhomamisitsweng ka molao wa bosetšhaba.
Moagi mongwe le mongwe yo o letleletsweng go tlhopha mo Ntlokokoano Bosetšhabeng e ka nna tokololo ya Kgotlapeomolao ya porofense ntle le –

item.p: mongwe le mongwe yo o thapilweng ke puso kgotsa moredi puso yo o amogelang moputso boemong jwa maemo a gagwe kgotsa tirelo, ntle le –
tonakgolo le ditokololo dingwe tsa khuduthamaga ya porofense; le
batlhankedi bangwe ba ditiro tsa bona di tsamaelanang le ditiro tsa tokololo ya kgotlapeomolao ya porofense, mme ditiro tsa bona di tlhomamisitswe fa di tshwana go ya ka molao ya bosetšhaba.
ditokololo tsa Ntlokokoano Bosetšhaba, baemedi ba leruri ba Khansele ya Bosetšhaba ya Diporofense kgotsa ditokololo tsa Lekgotla la Mmasepala;
mokoloti yo o sa kgopologeng;
mongwe le mongwe yo Kgotlatshekelo ya Rephaboliki e tsayang a sa itekanela mo tlhaloganyong;

mongwe le mongwe yo e rileng fa karolwana eno ya molao tsena tirisong a bonwa molato, mme a atlholwa dikgwedi tse di fetang 12 mo kgolegelong ntle le tšhono ya go duela, le fa e le mo gare ga Rephaboliki, kgotsa kwa ntle ga Rephaboliki; fa tiragalo eo e bonwa jaaka molato mo Rephaboliking, mme ga go ope yo tshwanetseng go amogelwa a atlhotswe go fitlhelela boikuelo kgatlhanong le kotlo kgotsa katlholo e tlhomamisiwa, kgotsa go fitlhelela nako ya boikuelo e feta. Go latlhegelwa ke ditshwanelo fa tlase ga kgaolo e go khutla morago ga ngwaga tse tlhano katlholo e weditswe.

content.p: Motho yo o sa tshwanelang go nna tokololo ya Kgotlapeomolao ya porofense go ya ka ka ditaelo tsa karolotlaleletso (1)(a) kgotsa (b) e ka nna ntlhopheng wa kgotlapeomolao go tsamaelana le tekanyetso nngwe le nngwe kgotsa kgotsa mabaka a tlhomamisitsweng ka molao wa bosetšhaba.
Motho o latlhegelwa ke botokololo jwa Kgotlapeomolao ya porofense fa motho yoo a –

item.p: kgaotsa go nna yo o ka tlhopiwang;
sa tlhagelele mo kgotlapeomolao ya porofense ntle le tetla le mororo melawana le ditaelo tsa kgotlapeomolao di tlhomamisa go latlhegelwa ke botokololo; kgotsa
kgaotsa go nna tokololo ya lekoko le le tlhophileng motho yoo jaaka tokololo ya kgotlapeomolao.

p.remark: [Kl.(3) e emetswe ke k. 4 ya Molaotheo Tlhabololo wa Bolesome wa Molao wa 2003.]

content.p: Diphatlhatiro tsa kgotlapeomolao Porofense di tshwanetse go tlatswa go ya ka molao ya bosetšhaba.

Pele ditokololo tsa kgotlapeomolao ya Porofense di simolola go dira ditiro tsa tsona mo kgotlapeomolao, di tshwanetse go ikana kgotsa go tshepisa boikanyego go Rephaboliking le go obamela Molaotheo go ya ka Mametlelelo ya 2.
Kgotlapeomolao ya porofense e tlhophiwa go dira paka ya dingwaga di le tlhano.

Fa kgotlapeomolao ya porofense e phatlhaladiwa go ya ka karolotlaleletso 109 kgotsa fa nako ya yona e fela, Tonakgolo ya porofense ka tiriso ya kgoeletso e tshwanetse go bitsa le go tlhomamisa letlha la ditlhopho, tse di tshwanetseng go tshwarwa mo nakong ya matsatsi a le 90 morago ga go phatlaladiwa ga kgotlapeomolao, kgotsa go fela ga paka ya yona peomolao, kgotsa nako e e fedileng ka yona. Go tshwanetse go ntshiwa Kgoeletso e e bitsang kopano le go totobatsa letlha ditlhopho pele kgotsa morago ga go fela ga paka ya kgotlapeomolao ya porofense.

p.remark: [Kl.(2) e emetswe ke k. 1 ya Molaotheo Tlhabololo wa Bone wa Molao wa 1999.]

content.p: Fa dipholo tsa ditlhopho tsa kgotlapeomolao ya porofense di sa phasaladiwe ka nako e e tlhalositsweng mo a karolo 190 kgotsa fa ditlhopo di kgapelwa thoko ke kgotlatshekelo, Moporesidente o tshwanetse go ntsha kgoeletso e e bitsang kopano le go tlhomamisa letlha le lengwe la ditlhopo,tse di tshwanetseng go tshwarwa mo nakong ya matsatsi a le 90 a paka e felang kgotsa ka letlha le ditlhopho di kgapetsweng thoko ka lona.

Peomolao ya porofense e sala e nonofile go dira go simolola motsing o e phatlhaladitsweng kgotsa nako ya yona e khutlang, go fitlhelela motsing o o fa pele ga letsatsing la ntlha la ditlhopho tsa kgotlapeomolao e e latelang.

section.heading: Go phatlaladiwa ga dikgotlapeomolao tsa diporofense pele ga bokhutlo jwa paka ya tsona

content.p: Tonakgolo ya porofense o tshwanetse go phatlalatsa kgotlapeomolao ya porofense fa –

item.p: kgotlapeomolao e amogetse tshwetso ya go phatlalala ka tshegetso ya bontsi jwa ditokololo tsa yona; le
go fetile dingwaga di le tharo e sa le kgotlapeomolao e tlhophilwe.

content.p: Tonakgolo ya nama-o-tshwere e tshwanetse go phatlalatsa kgotlapeomolao ya porofense fa–

item.p: go na le phatlha-tiro mo ofising ya Tonakgolo; le fa
kgotlapeomolao e retelelwa ke go tlhopha Tonakgolo e ntšhwa mo nakong ya matsatsi a le 30 morago ga phatlhatiro e ntse e le teng.

content.p: Morago ga ditlhopho, kopano ya ntlha ya kgotlapeomolao ya porofense e tshwanetse go epiwa ka nako le letlha le le tlhomamisitsweng ke moatlhodi yo o tlhophilweng ke Moatlhodimogolo,mme fela, e seng morago ga matsatsi a 14 dipholo tsa ditlhopho di itsisitswe. Kgotlapeomolao ya porofense e ka tlhomamisa nako, boleele jwa dikopano le dipaka tsa khunologo.

p.remark: [Kl.(1) e emetswe ke k. 8 ya Molaotheo Tlhabololo wa Borataro wa Molao wa 2001.]

content.p: Tonakgolo ya porofense e ka bitsa kopano e e kgethegileng ya Kgotlapeomolao ya porofense nako nngwe le nngwe go rerisa ka merero o kgethegileng.
Kgotlapeomolao ya porofense e ka tlhomamisa moo e tshwarelang dikopano gona.

Mo kopanong ya ntlha morago ga ditlhopho tsa yona, kgotsa fa go tlhokagala go tlatsa phatlha, Kgotlapeomolao ya porofense e tshwanetse go kgetha Mmusakgotla le Motlatsa Mmusakgotla mo ditokololong tsa yona.
Moatlhodi yo o tlhophilweng ke Moatlhodimogolo o tshwanetse go okama tsamaiso ya go tlhophiwa ga Mmusakgotla. Mmusakgotla o okama tsamaiso ya ditlhopho tsa Motlatsa Mmusakgotla.

p.remark: [Kl.(2) e emetswe ke k. 9 ya Molaotheo Tlhabololo wa Borataro wa Molao wa 2001.]

content.p: Tsamaiso e e tlhalositsweng mo Karolo A ya Mametlelelo 3 e dirisiwa fa go tlhophiwa Babusakgotla le Batlatsa Mmusakgotla.
Kgotlapeomolao ya porofense e ka tlosa Mmusakgotla mo tirong kgotsa 74 Motlatsa Mmusakgotla ka tshwetso. Bontsi jwa ditokololo tsa kgotlapeomolao di tshwanetse go nna teng fa tshwetso e atlanegisiwa.
Go ya ka melawana le ditaelo, kgotlapeomolao e ka tlhopha mo ditokololong tsa yona baeteledipele go thusa Mmusakgotla le Motlatsa Mmusakgotla.
Ntle le fa Molaotheo o tlhalosa ka tsela e nngwe –

item.p: bontsi jwa ditokololo tsa Kgotlapeomolao ya porofense di tshwanetse go nna teng pele go ka boutelwa Molaotlhomo kgotsa tlhabololo ya Molaotheo;
bonnye nngwe-tharo ya ditokololo e tshwanetse go nna teng pele go boutelwa potso nngwe le nngwe e e fa pele ga kgotlapeomolao;
dintlha tsotlhe tse di fa pele ga Kgotlapeomolao ya porofense di amogelwa ka bontsi jwa diboutu tse di dirilweng.

content.p: Tokololo ya Kgotlapeomolao ya porofense e okameng ga e letlwe go bouta ka tlwaelo, mme –

item.p: o tshwanetse go boutu go kgaolakgang fa diboutu tsa matlhakore oo mabedi di le maleka, e bile
o tshwanetse go boutu ka mokgwa wa tlwaelo fa, potso e tshwanetse go amogelwa ka tshegetso ya bonnye diboutu tsa pedi-tharo ya ditokololo tsakgotlapeomolao.

section.heading: Ditshwanelo tsa baemedi ba leruri mo kgotlapeomolao ya Porofense

content.p: Baemedi ba porofense ba leruri ba Khansele ya Bosetšhaba ya Diporofense ba ka tsenela, e bile ba ka bua mo kgotlapeomolao ya porofense ya bona le dikomiti tsa yona, fela ga ba tshwanela go bouta. Kgotlapeomolao e ka tlhoka moemedi wa leruri go tsena pitso ya yona kgotsa ya dikomiti tsa yona.
Mo go diragatseng thata ya yona ya molao, Kgotlapeomolao ya porofense e ka –

item.p: sekaseka, atlenegisa, tlhabolola kgotsa ya gana Molaotlhomo mongwe le mongwe o fa pele ga kgotlapeomolao; le
go tshitsinya kgotsa go baakanya molao, ntle le Melaotlhomo wa ditšhelete.

content.p: Kgotlapeomolao ya porofense e tshwanetse go tlhomamisa mekgwa ya go –

item.p: netefatsa fa ditheo tsotlhe tsa puso mo porofenseng rwala maikarabelo a tsona; le
go sekaseka –
bolaodi taolo mo porofenseng go akarediwa le tiragatso ya molao; le
setheo sengwe le sengwe sa puso ya porofense.

section.heading: Bopaki kgotsa tshedimosetso fa pele ga dikgotla peomolao tsa diporofense

content.p: Kgotlapeomolao ya porofense kgotsa nngwe le nngwe ya dikomiti tsa yona e ka –

item.p: bitsa mongwe le mongwe go tlhagelela fa pele ga tsona go neela bopaki a ikanne kgotsa ka go dira tshepiso kgotsa go tlhagisa ditokomane;
go laela motho kgotsa setheo sengwe le sengwe go tlhagisa pego fa pele ga yona; le

go gapeletsa, go tsamaelana le ditaelo tsa kgotlapeomolao ya porofense kgotsa melawana le ditaelo, motho kgotsa setheo sengwe le sengwe go itepatepanya le mabaka a tagafara kgotsa ditlhokego tsa temana (a) kgotsa (b); le
go amogela diphetišene, ditshwaelo kgotsa ditlhagiso go tswa go mongwe le mongwe yo o na leng kgatlhego kgotsa setheo.

section.heading: Dithulaganyo tsa ka fa teng, ditsweletso le ditsamaiso tsa dikgotlapeomolao tsa diporofense

content.p: Kgotlapeomolao ya porofense e ka –

item.p: tlhomamisa le go laola merero ya yona mo teng, ditsweletso le ditsamaiso, le
go dira melawana le ditaelo tebang le tiro ya yona, go etswe tlhoko kemedi le botsayakarolo jo bo gololesegileng, maikarabelo, puso ya botlhe le botsayaykarolo jwa setšhaba.

content.p: Melawana le ditaelo tsa Kgotlapeomolao ya porofense di tshwanetse go tlamela ka –

item.p: tlhamo, popego, maatla, ditiro, ditsamaiso le paka-tiro ya dikomiti tsa yona; le
botsaya karolo jwa makokopotlana a a na leng baemedi mo ditsamaisong tsa kgotlapeomolao ka mokgwa o o tsamaelang le demokerasi;

thuso ya tšhelete le tsamaiso go lekoko lengwe le lengwe la sepolotiki le le na leng baemedi mo kgotlapeomolao, go ya ka tekanyetso ya kemedi go kgontsha lekoko le moeteledipele wa lona go dira ditiro tsa bona mo Kgotlapeomolao; le
go amogela moeteledipele wa lekoko le legolo la kganetso mo kgotlapeomolao, jaaka Moeteledipele wa Lekoko Kganetso.

content.p: Ditokololo tsa Kgotlapeomolao ya porofense le ditokololo tsa porofense tsa leruri tsa Khansele ya Bosetšhaba ya Diporofense –

item.p: di na le kgololosego puo mo Kgotlapeomolao le mo dikomiting tsa yona, go tsamaelana le melawana le ditaelo tsa yona; e bile
ga ba rwale maikarabelo a ditatofatso tsa dikgetsi tsa ngangisano kgotsa bosenyi, go tshwariwa, kotlhao ya kgolegelo kgotsa ditshenyegelo ka ntlha ya –
sengwe le sengwe se ba se buileng, ba se tlhagisitseng, kgotsa neetseng Kgotlapeomolao kgotsa nngwe le nngwe ya dikomiti tsa yona; kgotsa
sengwe le sengwe se se utulotsweng ka ntlha ya sengwe se ba se buileng, tlhagisitseng fa pele, kgotsa neetsweng Kgotlapeomolao kgotsa nngwe ya dikomiti tsa yona.

content.p: Ditetlelelo le dishireletsego dingwe tsa Kgotlapeomolao le ditokololo tsa yona di ka tlhomamisiwa ka molao wa bosetšhaba.
Meputso, diallawanse le ditshiamelo tse di duelwang ditokololo tsa Kgotlapeomolao ya porofense di tsewa ka tlhamalalo go tswa go Lotlele la Lotseno la porofense.

section.heading: Phitlhelelo le botsaya karolo jwa botlhe mo dikgotlapeomolao tsa diporofense

content.p: Kgotlapeomolao ya porofense e tshwanetse go –

item.p: ntshetsapele botsaya karolo jwa setšhaba mo molaong le ditsamaiso tse dingwe tsa Kgotlapeomolao le dikomiti tsa yona; le
akaretsa botlhe mo tsamaisang ya ditiro tsa yona, le go tshwara dikopano tsa yona, le tsa dikomiti tsa yona mo pepeneneng; mme dikgato tse maleba di tshwanetse go tsewa –
go laola phitlhelelo ya batho, go akarediwa phitlhelelo ya bogasi go Kgotlapeomolao le dikomiti tsa yona; le
go rulaganya phuruphutso ya mongwe le mongwe , mme fa go le maleba, go thibelwa go tsena kgotsa go tlosiwa ga mongwe le mongwe.

content.p: Kgotlapeomolao ya porofense gay a tshwanela go thibela setšhaba go akaretsa bogasi mo dikopanong tsa komiti ya yona ntle le fa le go le matshwanedi e bile go siame go dira jaalo mo dikgatlhegelong tsa setšhaba le demokerasi.

Ke fela ditokololo tsa Kgotlakhuduthamaga ya porofense kgotsa komiti kgotsa tokololo ya kgotlapeomolao ya porofense e ka itsiseng Molaotlhomo mo Kgotlapeomolao; mme ke fela tokololo ya Kgotlakhuduthamaga e e rweleng maikarabelo a merero ya matlotlo mo porofenseng, kgotsa tokololo e e kgethilweng ke Tonakgolo, e ka itsiseng Molaotlhomo wa ditšhelete mo kgotlapeomolao.
Molaotlhomo ke Molaotlhomo wa tšhelete fa o,

item.p: thala tekanyetsokabo ya tšhelete;
rulaganya lekgetho la porofense, makgethwana, ditefelo kgotsa dituediso tsa tlaleletso;
fedisa kgotsa fokotsa, kgotsa o letlelela dikgololo tsa lekgetho lengwe le lengwela porofense, makgethwana, ditefelo kgotsa dituediso tsa tlaleletso; kgotsa
katlanegisa ya dituelo ka tlhamalalo go tswa go Letlole la Lotseno la Porofense.

content.p: Molaotlhomo wa tšhelete ga o tshwanelwa go samagana le morero mongwe ntle le -

item.p: morero o monnye malebana le tekanyetso ya tšhelete;
taelo, phediso kgotsa phokoletso ya makgetho a porofense, makgethwana, ditefelo kgotsa dituediso tsa tlaleletso;
go rebola dikgololo tsa makgetho a porofense, makgethwana, ditefelo kgotsa dituediso tsa tlaleletso; kgotsa
katlanegiso ya dituelo ka tlhamalalo go tswa go Letlole la Lotseno lwa Porofense.

content.p: Molao wa porofense o tshwanetse go tlamela ka tsela e ka yona kgotlapeomolao ya porofense e ka tlhabololang Molaotlhomo wa tšhelete.

p.remark: [K. 120 e emetswe ke k. 3 ya Molaotheo Tlhabololo wa Bosupa wa Molao wa 2001.]

content.p: Tonakgolo ya porofense e tshwanetse go atlenegisa kgotsa go saena Molaotlhomo o o amogetsweng ke kgotlapeomolao ya porofense go ya ka Kgaolo eno, kgotsa fa Tonakgolo o na le dipelaelo ka bomolaotheo jwa Molaotlhomo, o tshwanetse go busetsa Molaotlhomo morago go kgotlapeomolao go sekasekwa.

Fa morago ga go sekwasekwa bošwa ga Molaotlhomo, Molaotlhomo o kgotsofatsa dipelaelo tsa Tonakgolo, Tonakgolo e tshwanetse go atlenegisa le go saena Molaotlhomo, kgotsa fa go se jaalo, Tonakgolo e tshwanetse go –

item.p: atlenegisa le go seana Molaotlhomo; kgotsa
o romela go Kgotlatshekelo ya Molaotheo go tlhomamisa bomolaotheo jwa one.

content.p: Fa Kgotlatshekelo ya Molaotheo e tlhomamisa gore Molaotlhomo o tsamaelana le molaotheo, Tonakgolo e tshwanetse go atlenegisa le go saena Molaotlhomo.

section.heading: Kopo ka ditokololo go Kgotlatshekelo ya Molaotheo

content.p: Ditokololo tsa kgotlapeomolao ya porofense di ka dira kopo go Kgotlatshekelo ya Molaotheo go dira taelo go netefatsa fa molao otlhe kgotsa karolo ya Molao o atlenegisitsweng ga e tsamaelane le Molaotheo.
Kopo –

item.p: e tshwanetse go emiwa nokeng ke diperesente di le 20 tsa ditokololo tsa kgotlapeomolao; e
e tshwanetse go dirwa mo nakong ya matsatsi a le 30 morago ga katlanegiso le go saeniwa ga molao ke Tonakgolo.

content.p: Kgotlatshekelo ya Molaotheo e ka laela gore Molao otlhe kgotsa karolo ya Molao o go dirilweng kopo boemong jwa yona, go ya ka karolotlaletso 1 o se dirisiwe go fitlhela Kgotlatshekelo e dira tshwetso ya kopo, fa –

item.p: dikgatlhego tsa bosiamisi di tlhoka seo; e bile
go na le kgonagalo ya go atlega ga kopo.

content.p: fa kopo e sa atlega,e bile e sena kgonagalo ya katlego, Kgotlatshekelo ya Molaotheo e tshwanetse go laela bakopi go duela ditshenyegelo.

Molaotlhomo yo o atlenegisitweng le go saeniwa ke Tonakgolo ya Porofense o nna Molao wa Porofense, o tshwanetse go phatlaladiwa ka bonako e bile o simolola go dira fa o phatlaladitswe ka letlha le le tlhomamisitsweng ke Molao.
Kgatiso e e saenilweng ya Molao wa Porofense ke bopaki jo bo feletseng jwa ditaelo tsa Molao, e bile morago ga phatlalatso o tshwanetse go bolokwa kwa Kgotlatshekelo ya Molaotheo.

section.heading: Bothati taolo jwa khuduthamaga ya diporofense

content.p: Bothati taolo jwa khuduthamaga ya porofense bo abetswe Tonakgolo ya Porofense eo.
Tonakgolo e dirisa matla a bothati taolo jwa khuduthamaga, mmogo le ditokololo tse dingwe tsa Khansele ya Kgotla Khuduthamaga, ka –

item.p: go dirisa molao wa porofense;
go tsenya tirisong melao yotlhe ya bosetšhaba go ya ka tlhaloso ya Mametlelelo 4 kgotsa 5, ntle le fa Molaotheo kgotsa Molao wa Palamente o tlhalosang ka mokgwa mongwe;
go tsamaisa mo Porofenseng, molao wa bosetšhaba ntle le ditiro tse di tlhalositsweng Mametlelelo 4 le 5, eo tsamaiso ya yona e abetsweng khuduthamaga ya porofense go ya ka Molao wa Palamente;
tlhabololo le tiragatso ya maikamisetso a Porofense;
thulaganyo ya ditiro tsa tsamaiso ya Porofense le mafapha a yona;
tshitsinyo le tshimololo ya molao wa Porofense; le
tiragatso ya tiro ngwe le ngwe e e abetsweng khuduthamaga ya porofense go ya ka Molaotheo kgotsa Molao wa Palamente.

content.p: Porofense e na le bothati taolo jwa khuduthamaga go ya ka karolotlaleletso (2)(b) fela fa Porofense e nale bokgoni jwa go rulaganya tsamaiso maikarabelo a yona ka manontlhotlho. Puso ya setšhaba ka molao le dikgato tse dingwe e tshwanetse go thusa Porofense go tlhabolola bokgoni jo bo tlhokegang jwa tsamaiso go diragatsa matla a yona botwerere le ditiro tsa yona, tse di tlalositsweng mo karolotlaleletso (2).

Ngongorego nngwe le nngwe e e amanang le bokgoni jwa tsamaiso ya Porofense mabapi le tiro nngwe le nngwe, e tshwanetse go romelwa go Khansele ya Setšhaba ya Diporofense go rarabololwa mo nakong ya matsatsi a le 30 ka letlha la go romelo go Khansele.
Go ya ka karolo 100, tiragatso ya molao wa porofense mo porofenseng ke thata e e kgethegileng ya khuduthamaga ya Porofense.
Khuduthamaga ya Porofense e tshwanetse go dira go ya ka –

item.p: Molaotheo; le
Molaotheo wa Porofense, fa molaotheo wa porofense o atlenigisitse.

content.p: Tokololo ya Khansele ya Khuduthamaga ya Porofense e ka abela Khansele ya Mmasepala thata kgotsa tiro nngwe le nngwe e e tshwanetsweng go dirwa go ya ka Molao wa Palamente, kgotsa Molao wa porofense. Kabo ya tiro –

item.p: e tshwanetse go diriwa ka tumelano gareng ga tokololo ya Khansele ya Khuduthamaga e e maleba le Khansele ya Mmasepala;
e tshwanetse go tsamaelana le Molao go ya ka thata e e maleba kgotsa tiro e e diriwang; e bile
e tsena tirisong fa Tonakgoloe dirile kgoeletso.

content.p: Tonakgolo ya Porofense e na le dithata le ditiro tse di abetsweng kantoro ka Molaotheo le molao monngwe le monngwe.
Tonakgolo ya Porofense e na le maikarabelo a go –

item.p: atlanegisa le go saena Melaotlhomo;
go romela Molaotlhomo morago go kgotlapeomolao ya porofense go sekaseka bomolaotheo jwa Molaotlhomo;
go romela Molaotlhomo go Kgotlatshekelo ya Molaotheo go sekseka bomolaotheo jwa Molaotlhomo;
go bitsa kopano e e kgethegileng ya Kgotlapeomolao go rarabolola merero e e kgethegileng;
go tlhoma dikhomišene tsa patlisiso; le
go tshwara referantamo mo Porofenseng go ya ka molao wa bosetšhaba.

content.p: Ka kopano ya bona ya ntlha morago ga ditlhopho, le fa go tlhokega go tlatsa phatlhatiro, kgotlapeomolao ya porofense e tshwanetse go tlhopha mosadi kgotsa monna fa gare ga ditokololo tsa yona go nna Tonakgolo ya porofense.
Moatlhodi yo o kgethilweng ke Moatlhodimogolo o okama ditsamaiso tsa ditlhopho tsa Tonakgolo. Tsela e e tlhaositsweng Karolo A ya Mametlelelo 3 e dirisiwa fa go tlhophiwa Tonakgolo.

p.remark: [Kl.(2) e emetswe ke k. 10 ya Molaotheo Tlhabololo wa Borataro wa Molaowa 2001.]

content.p: Tlhopho ya go tlatsa phatlhatiro ya boTonakgolo e tshwanetse go tshwarwa ka nako le letlha le le tlhomamisitsweng ke Moatlhodimogolo, fela e seng morago ga matsatsi a le 30 morago ga go nna teng ga phatlha.

p.remark: [Kl.(3) e emetswe ke k. 10 ya Molaotheo Tlhabololo wa Borataro wa Molao wa 2001.]

content.p: Tonakgolo e e kgethilweng e tshwanetse go simolola tiro mo nakong ya matsatsi a matlhano Morago ga go kgethiwa, ka go ikana kgotsa go dira tshepiso ya boikanyego go Rephaboliki le kobamelo ya Molaotheo go ya ka Mametlelelo 2.

section.heading: Paka-Tiro le go tlosiwa ga Ditonakgolo

content.p: Paka-tiro ya tonakgolo e simolola fa Tonakgolo e simolola tiro mme e khutla morago ga go tlhagelela ga phatlhatiro kgotsa fa motho yo o kgethilweng go nna motlhatlhami jaaka Tonakgolo a simolola tiro.

Ga go ope yo o letleletsweng go nna Tonakgolo go feta dipaka di le pedi, mme fa motho a kgethilwe go tlatsa phatlhatiro mo maemong a Tonakgolo, paka gare ga ditlhopho tseo le ditlhopho tse di latelang tsa boTonakgolo ga di tsewa jaaka paka ya tiro.
Kgotlapeomolao ya porofense, ka tshwetso ya tshegetso ya bonnye diboutu tsa pedi-tharo ya maloko a yona, a ka tlosa Tonakgolo mo tirong fela ka ntlha ya –

item.p: tshiamololo e e masisi ya Molaotheo kgotsa molao;
maitshwaro a makgwakgwa;
go palelwa ke go dira tiro ya maemo a gagwe.

content.p: Mongwe le mongwe yo o tlositsweng mo tirong ya Botonakgolo go ya ka karolotlaleletso 3(a) kgotsa (b) ga a tshwanela go amogela ditshwanelo dipe go tswa go kantoro eo, e bile ga a tshwanela go modiredi wa setšhaba.
Fa Tonakgolo e se teng kgotsa a sa kgone go dira tiro ya boTonakgolo,kgotsa fa go nale phatlhatiro boTonakgolo, motlhankedi yo tlhatlhamang Tonakgolo ka maemo o nama-a-tshwere jaaka Tonakgolo:

item.p: Tokololo ya Kgotla Khuduthamaga e e kgethilweng ke Tonakgolo.
Tokololo ya Kgotla Khuduthamaga e e kgethilweng ke ditokololo tsa Khansele.
Mmusakgotla, go fitlhela kgotlapeomolao e tlhopa mongwe wa ditokololo tsa yona.

content.p: Tonakgolo ya nama-o-tshwere e na le maikarabelo, dithata le ditiro tsa Tonakgolo.

Pele a rwala maikarabelo, ditlamego le ditiro tsa boTonakgolo, Tonakgolo ya nama-o-tshwere e tshwanetse go ikana kgotsa tshepisa boikanyego go Rephaboliki le go obamela Molaotheo go ya ka Mametlelelo 2.

Khansele ya Khuduthamaga ya porofense e bopiwa ke Tonakgolo jaaka tlhogo ya Khansele, le palo e e seng fa tlase ga tlhano le e e sa feteng lesome ya ditokololo tse di tlhophilweng ke Tonakgolo mo ditokololong tsa kgotlapeomolao ya porofense.
Tonakgolo ya porofense o tlhopha ditokololo tsa Khansele ya khuduthamaga, a ba abele dithata le ditiro, e bile a ka ba rola tiro.
Ditokololo tsa Khansele ya khuduthamaga ya porofense di rwele maikarabelo a ditiro tsa khuduthamaga jaaka ba e abetswe ke Tonakgolo.
Ditokololo tsa Khuduthamaga ya porofense ba rwele maikarabelo ka bojotlhe le ka bongwe ka bongwe go kgotlapeomolao ka tiragatso ya ditiro tsa bona.
Ditokololo tsa Khansele ya Khuduthamaga ya porofense di tshwanetse –

item.p: go dira go tsamaelana le Molaotheo; le
go tlamela kgotlapeomolao ka dipegelo tsa merero e e fa tlase ga kgotlapeomolao.

section.heading: Tswelelopele ya Dikgotla Khuduthamaga morago ga Ditlhopho

content.p: Fa go tshwariwa ditlhopho tsa kgotlapeomolao, Kgotla ya khuduthamaga le ditokololo tsa yona di dula di ntse na le maatla a go dira go fitlha motho yo o tlhophilweng jaaka Tonakgolo ke Kotlapeomolao e e latelang a simolola tiro.

Pele ditokololo tsa Kgotla Khuduthamaga ya porofense di simolola go dira ditiro tsa bona, ba tshwanetse go ikana kgotsa go tshepisa boikanyego jwa bona go Rephaboliki le go obamela Molaotheo, go ya ka Mametlelelo 2.
Ditokololo tsa Kgotla Khuduthamaga ya porofense di tshwanetse go dira go ya ka Khoutu ya melawana ya maitshwaro o o tlhomamisitsweng ke molao wa bosetšhaba.
Ditokololo tsa Khansele ya Bosetšhaba ga di a letlelelwa go –

item.p: dira tiro e nngwe gape e e duelang;

itshwara ka mokgwa o o kgatlhanong le seriti sa tiro ya bona kgotsa go ikgolaganya le maemo a tla bakang thulano ya dikgatlhegelo gare ga maikarabelo a bona a semolao le dikgatlhego tsa poraefete; kgotsa
dirisa maemo a bona kgotsa tshedimoso e ba filwengt yona ka botshepegi go ikhumisa kgotsa go dira gore motho yo mongwe a une molemo ka mokgwa o o sa siamang.

content.p: Tonakgolo ka phatlalatso a ka abela tokololo ya kgotla khuduthamaga –

item.p: tsamaiso ya molao monngwe le monngwe yo o roletsweng tokololo eo; kgotsa
thata kgotsa tiro nngwe le nngwe e e roletsweng tokololo eo go ya ka molao.

content.p: Tonakgolo ya porofense e ka abela tokololo ya Khansele ya Khuduthamaga thata kgotsa tiro nngwe le nngwe ya tokololo engwe e e seyong mo ofising kgotsa e e palelwang go diragatsa dithata kgotsa tiro eo.

section.heading: Go tsereganya ga porofense mo puso selegae

content.p: Fa mmasepala a palelwa kgotsa a sa kgone go dira ditshwanelo tsa yona bokhuduthamaga go ya ka Molaotheo kgotsa Molao, khuduthamaga ya porofense e e amegang e ka thusa ka go tsaya dikgato tse di maleba go netefatsa tiragatso tiro eo, go akarediwa –

item.p: go ntsha taelo go Khansele ya Mmasepala, e e tlhalosang selekano sa go palelwa ke go dira tiro eo, le go tlhalosa kgato nngwe le nngwe e e tshwanetseng go diriwa go netefatsa tiro eo; le
go rwala maikarabelo a tiro go mmasepala yoo, go ya ka moo go tlhokegang go –
diragatsa maemo a a botlhokwa a setšhaba kgotsa go fitlhelela maemo a tekanyetso a tlhomilweng a bosetšhaba a thebolo ya ditirelo;
thibela mmasepala go tsaya kgato e e sa siamang e e leng kgatlhanong le dikgatlhegelo tsa mmasepala yo mongwe kgotsa go porofense ka bophara; kgotsa
netefatsa kgolo ya ikonomi, kgotsa
Go phatlalatsa Khansele ya Mmasepala le go thapa motsamaisi go fitlha go tlhophiwa Khansele e ntšhwa ya Mmasepala, fa maemo a kgethegileng a letlelela kgato ya mofuta oo.

content.p: Fa khuduthamaga ya porofense e thusa mmasepala go ya ka mabaka a karolotlaleletso (1)(b) –

item.p: e tshwanetse go romela kitsiso e e kwadilweng ya go thusa go -
tokololo ya Kabinete e e rweleng maikarabelo a merero ya pusoselegae; le

kgotlapeomolao ya porofense e e maleba le Khansele ya Bosetšhaba ya Diporofense thuso ya go tsereganya e tshwanetse go khutla mo nakong ya matsatsi a le 14 morago ga tshimolola ga thuso ya tsereganyo,
thuso ya tsereganyo e tshwanetse go khutla fa -

tokololo ya Kabinete e e rweleng maikarabelo a merero ya pusoselegae a sa amogele thuso ya tsereganyo mo nakong ya matsatsi a le 28 morago ga tshimololo ya thuso ya tsereganyo kgotsa ka bokhutlo jwa paka eo a sa amogela thuso ya tsereganyo, kgotsa
Khansele e kgaphela thoko thuso ya tsereganyo mo nakong ya matsatsi a le 180 morago ga tshomologo ga thuso ya tsereganyo kgotsa fa ka bokhutlo jwa paka eo a se a amogela thuso ya tsereganyo, mme
fa thuso ya tsereganyo entse e tswelela pele, Khansele e tshwanetse go sekaseka thuso ya tsereganyo gangwe le gape e bile e ka dira ditshitsinyo go khuduthamaga ya porofense .

content.p: Fa Khansele ya Mmasepala e phatlaladiwa go ya ka karolotlaletso (1)(c)-

item.p: khuduthamaga ya porofense e tshwanetse go romela kitsiso e e kwadilweng ya phatlalatso ka bonako, go -
tokololo ya Kabinete e e rweleng maikarabelo a merero ya pusoselegae, le go
kgotlapeomolao ya porofense e e maleba le Khansele ya Bosetšhaba ya Diporofense, e bile

phatlalatso e tsena tirisong mo nakong ya matsati a le 14 go simolola ka letlha la kamogelo ya kitsiso ke Khansele ntle le fa e kgaphetswe thoko ke tokololo eo ya Kabinete kgotsa Khansele pele go fela matsatsi a le 14.

content.p: Fa mmasepala o sa kgone kgotsa o sa diragatse tiro go ya ka Molaotheo kgotsa molao go amogela tekanyetsokabo kgotsa dikgato tsa go kgobokanya matlole tse di leng botlhokwa go diragatsa tekanyetsokabo, khuduthamaga ya porofense e e maleba e tshwanetse go tsereganya ka go tsaya kgato nngwe le nngwe e e maleba go netefatsa fa tekanyetsokabo kgotsa dikgato tsa go kgobokanya matlole di a amogelwa, go akaretsa le go phatlalatsa ga Khansele ya Mmasepala le go -

item.p: thapa motsamaisi go fitlha go tlhophiwa Khansele e ntšhwa ya Mmasepala, le go
amogela tekanyetsokabo ya nakwana kgotsa dikgato tse di kgobokanyang matlole go ntshetsapele tiro ya mmasepala.

content.p: Fa mmasepala, ka ntlha ya mathata a merero ya yona ya ditšhelete, o le mo mathateng kgotsa o tlholega go tlamela ka ditirelo tse di botlhokwa kgotsa go fitlhelela ditlamego tsa ona tsa ditšhelete, kgotsa o amogela fa o palelewa ke go fitlhelela ditlamego tsa ona kgotsa ditlamego tsa ditšhelete, khuduthamaga e e maleba ya porofense e tshwanetse go-

item.p: tsenyatirisong leano tlhabololo ka maikaelelo a go matlafatsa bokgoni jwa mmasepla go fitlhelela ditlamego tsa ona malebana le go tlamela ka ditirelo tse di botlhokwa kgotsa ditlamego tsa ona tsa ditšhelete, eo e tshwanetseng -
go rulaganngwa go ya ka molao wa bosetšhaba, e bile
o tlama mmasepala go diragatsa bothati molao le taolo ya bokhuduthamaga, fela ka maikaelelo a go fitlhelela maano a go rarabolola mathata ano a ditšhelete, le

phatlalatsa Khansele ya Mmasepala, fa mmasepala o sa kgone kgotsa o sa amogele dikgato tsa semolao, go akarediwa le tekanyetsokabo kgotsa kgato nngwe le nngwe ya go kgobokanya matlole tse di leng botlhokwa go tsenyatirisong leano tlhabololo, le go -
thapa motsamaisi go fitlha go tlhophiwa Khansele e ntšhwa ya Mmasepala, le go
amogela tekanyetsokabo ya nakwana kgotsa dikgato tsa go kgobokanya matlole kgotsa kgato nngwe le nngwe fela e e ka tsenyangtirisong leano tlhabololo go ntshetsapele tiro ya mmasepala, kgotsa

fa Khansele ya Mmasepala e sa phatlaladiwe go ya ka temana (b), e tshwanetse go rwala maikarabelo a go tsenyatirisong leano tlhabololo go fitlha go bonaga gore mmasepala ga o kgone kgotsa ga o tsenyetirisong leano tlhabololo.

content.p: Fa khuduthamaga ya porofense e tsereganya mo mmasepaleng go ya ka karolotlaleletso (4) kgotsa (5), e tshwanetse go romela kitsiso e e kwadilweng ya thuso ya tsereganyo go-

item.p: tokololo ya Kabinete e e rweleng maikarabelo ya merero ya pusoselegae, le go
kgotlapeomolao ya porofense e e maleba le Khansele ya Bosetšhaba ya Diporofense, mo nakong ya matsatsi a le supa morago ga thuso ya tsereganyo.

content.p: Fa khuduthamaga ya porofense e sa kgone kgotsa e sa diragatse dithata ka tshwanelo kgotsa e sa dire ditiro tsa yona go ya ka tlhaloso ya karolotlaleletso (4) kgotsa (5), khuduthamaga ya bosetšhaba e tshwanetse go tsereganya go ya ka karolotlaleletso (4) kgotsa (5) boemong jwa khuduthamaga ya porofense e e maleba.
Molao wa bosetšhaba o tshwanetse go laola tiragatso ya karolo eno, go akaretsa ditsela tse di tlhalositsweng ke karolo eno.

p.remark: [K. 139 e emetswe ke k. 4 Molaotheo Tlhabololo wa Bosomenngwe wa Molaowa 2003.]

item.p: (1) Tshwetso ya Tonakgolo ya porofense e tshwanetse go kwadiwa fa fatshe, fa –
e dirilwe go tsamaelana le molao; kgotsa
e na le ditlamorago tsa semolao.

content.p: Tshwetso e e kwadilweng ya Tonakgolo e tshwanetse go saeniwa sa bobedi ke tokololo e nngwe ya Khuduthamaga ya Khansele, fa tshwetso eo e amana tiro e e abetsweng tokololo eo.
Dikgoeletso, melawana le didiriswa dingwe tsa molao wa porofense di tshwanetse go fitlhelelwa ke batho botlhe.
Molao wa porofense o tshwanetse go totobatsa mokgwa o ka ona, le phitlhelelo e ka yona, didiriswa tse di tlhalosistsweng mo karolotlaleletso (3) di tshwanetseng go –

item.p: rarabololwa ka ona mo kgotlapeomolao ya porofense; le
go atlanegisiwa ke kgotlapeomolao ya porofense.

content.p: Fa Kgotlapeomolao ya porofense ka tshegetso ya bontsi jwa diboutu tsa ditokololo tsa yona e amogela tumelano ya go tlhoka boikanyego go Khansele ya Khuduthamaga ya porofense, ntle le Tonakgolo, Tonakgolo o tshwanetse go tlhama Khansele sešwa.

Fa kgotlapeomolao ya porofense ka tlhopho ya bontsi jwa diboutu tsa ditokololo tsa yona e amogela tumelano ya go tlhoka boikanyego go Tonakgolo ya porofense, Tonakgolo le ditokololo dingwe tsa Khansele di tshwanetse go leboga tiro.
Kgotlapeomolao ya porofense e ka atlenegisa molaotheo wa porofense, kgotsa fa go kgonega ya fetola molaotheo wa yona, fa fela bonnye ditokololo di le pedi-tharo di bouta go dumelana le molaotlhomo.
Molaotheo wa porofense kgotsa tlhabololo ya molaotheo e tshwanetse go tsamaelana, le Molaotheo ono, fela o tshwanetse go tlamela –

item.p: kgotlapeomolao ya porofense kgotsa ditheo tsa Khuduthamaga le ditsamaiso tse di farologanang go na le tse di tlhalositsweng mo Molaotheong ono; kgotsa
setheo, seabe, bothati le maemo a bogosi ba setso, fa go le botlhokwa.

content.p: Ditaelo tse di akareditsweng mo molaotheong wa porofense kgotsa tlhabololo ya molaotheo go ya ka temana (a) kgotsa (b) tsa karolotlaleletso (1) –

item.p: di tshwanetse go tsamaelana le meetlo ya karolo 1 le Kgaolo 3, e bile
gay a tshwanela go abela porofense thata efe kapa efe kgotsa tiro e e welang–
kwa ntle ga tikologo ya bokgoni jwa porofense ka ditaelo tsa Mametlelelo 4 le 5; kgotsa
kwa ntle ga dithata le ditiro tse di abetsweng porofense go ya ka dikarolo dingwe tsa Molaotheo.

section.heading: Kamogelo semmuso ya melaotheo ya porofense

content.p: Fa kgotlapeomolao ya porofense e atlanegisitse kgotsa e tlhabolotse molaotheo, Mmusakgotla wa Kgotlapeomolao o tshwanetse go tokomane ya molaotheo oo kwa kgotlatshekelo ya Molaotheo go amogelwa semmuso.
Ga go tokomane ya molaotheo wa Porofense kgotsa tlhabololo ya molaotheo e e tshwanetseng go nna molao go fitlhelela kgotlatshekelo ya molaotheo go o amogela semmuso –

item.p: gore tokomane e atlenegisitswe go ya ka karolo 142; le
gore tokomane yotlhe e tsaemaelana le Karolo 143.

section.heading: Go saeniwa, phasalatso le polokego ya melaotheo ya porofense

content.p: Tonakgolo ya porofense o tshwanetse go amogela le go saena tokomane ya molaotheo wa porofense kgotsa tlhabololo ya molaotheo e e amogetsweng semmuso ke kgotla ya Molaotheo.

Molaotheo o o atlanegitsweng e bile o saennwe ke Tonakgolo o tshwanetse go phasaladiwa mo Lokwalo Puso la Bosetšhaba, e bile o tsena tirisong ka letlha la phasalatso kgotsa ka letlha la moragonyana le le tlhomamisitsweng go ya ka molaotheo oo, kgotsa tlhabololo.

Molaotheo wa porofense o o saenilweng kgotsa tlhabololo ya Molaotheo ke bopaki jo bo feletseng jwa ditaelo tsa yona, e bile morago ga phasalatso, o tshwanetse go romelwa go Kgotlatshekelo ya Molaotheo go bolokiwa gona.

section.heading: Dikgotlhang fa gare ga kgotlapeomolao ya bosetšhaba le ya Porofense

content.p: Karolo eno, e ama dikgotlhang gare ga kgotlapeomolao ya bosetšhaba le kgotlapeomolao ya porofense o o tsamaelanang le tlhaloso ya Mametlelelo 4.
Molao wa bosetšhaba o o amang naga ka bophara o na le matla godimo ga molao wa porofense fa fela lenngwe ya mabaka a latelang le fitlheletswe:

item.p: Kgotlapeomolao ya bosetšhaba e dira ka lebaka le le sa kgoneng go laolwa sentle ke molao o o dirilweng ke porofense eo ka namana.
Kgotlapeomolao ya bosetšhaba e dira ka lebaka leo le tla kgonang fela fa tiragatso e ka tshwana na ka bophara, mme kgotlapeomolao ya bosetšhaba e neelana ka go tshwana goo, ka go tlhama –
meono le mabaka;
manaanetsamaiso; kgotsa
dipholisi tsa bosetšhaba.
Molao wa bosetšhaba o botlhokwa go –
matlafatsa pabalesego ya bosetšhaba;
matlafatsa kgolo ya ikonomi;
tshireletso ya mebaraka yotlhe go ya ka tshutiso ya dithoto, ditirelo matlotlo le badiri;
kgodiso ya ditirelo tsa ikonomi porofense ka bophara;
kgodiso ya ditšhono tse di lekanang kgotsa phitlhelelo ya ditirelo tsa puso ka tekano; kgotsa
tshireletso ya tikologo.

content.p: Molao wa bosetšhaba o okama molao wa porofense fa molao wa bosetšhaba o tobile go thibela kgato e e senang boikarabelo ke porofense, ya –

item.p: e gobelelegileng mo go tsa ikonomi, boitekanelo le dikgatlhagelo tsa tshireletso ya porofense e nngwe kgotsa naga ka bophara; kgotsa
e kgoreletsa tiragatso ya dipholisi tsa bosetšhaba tsa ikonomi.

content.p: Fa go na le kgotlhang mabapi le molao wa bosetšhaba o botlhokwa go tsamaelana le makaelelo a karolotlaleletsi 2(c), mme kgotlhang eo e tlhagelela fa pele ga Kgotlatshekelo go rarabololwa, Kgotlatshekelo e tshwanetse go ela tlhoko kamogelo kgotsa go se amogelwa ga molao oo, ke Khansele ya Bosetšhaba ya diporofense.
Molao wa porofense o okama molao wa bosetšhaba fa karolotlaleletso (2 ) kgotsa (3) e sa dirisiwe.
Molao o o dirilweng go ya ka Molao wa Palamente kgotsa molao wa porofense o dira fela fa molao oo o atlanegisitswe ke Khansele ya Bosetšhaba ya Diporofense.

Fa Khansele ya Bosetšhaba e sa fitlhelele tshwetso mo nakong ya matsatsi a le 30 a kopano ya yona ya ntlha morago ga go romelwa molao, molao oo, o tshwanetse go sekasekelwa ekare o atlanegisitswe ke Khansele.

Fa Khansele ya Bosetšhaba ya Diporofense e sa atlanegise molao o o tlhalosiwang jaaka wa karolotlaleletso (6 ), e tshwanetse gore mo nakong ya matsatsi a le 30 a tshwetso ya yona, e tshwanetse go bolelela bothati jo bo e rometseng molao mabaka goreng molao oo, o sa atlanegisiwa.
Fa go na le kgotlhang fa gare molao wa bosetšhaba le taelo ya molaotheo wa porofense mabapi le –

item.p: morero o o amang Molaotheo o o batlang kgotsa yo o tshitsinyang tlhabololo ya molao wa bosetšhaba, molao wa bosetšhaba o okama taelo ya molaotheowa porofense; kgotsa
thuso tsereganyo ya molao ya bosetšhaba go ya ka mabaka a karolo 44(2), molao wa bosetšhaba e e okama molaotheo wa porofense; kgotsa
morero wa tiro e e tlhalositsweng mo Mametlelelo 4, karolo 146 e dirisiwa ekete taelo ya molaotheo wa porofense ke peomolao ya porofense e e tlhalositsweng mo karolong eo.

content.p: Molao wa bosetšhaba o umakiwang mo karolo 44(2) e okama molao wa porofense fa e le merero e e tlhalositsweng mo lenaane la Mametlelelo 5.

section.heading: Dikgotlhang tse di ka se kgoneng go rarabololwa

content.p: Fa ngongorego e e amang kgotlhang e sa kgone go rarabololwa ke kgotlatshekelo, molao wa bosetšhaba ke ona o tla okamang molao wa porofense kgotsa molaotheo wa porofense.

section.heading: Maemo a molao o o seyong

content.p: Tshwetso ya kgotla ya gore molao yo mongwe o okame yo mongwe, ga e tsele molao yo mongwe matla, fela molao yoo ga o dire go fitlhela kgotlhang e rarabololwa.

Fa go sekwasekwa kgotlhang e e bonalang gare ga molao wa bosetšhaba le molao wa porofense, le molaotheo wa porofense, kgotlatshekelo nngwe le nngwe e tshwanetse go amogela tlholoso e e maleba ya molao kgotsa ya molaotheo, e e sa bakeng kgotlhang, godimo ga tlhaloso nngwe le nngwe e e tla bakang kgotlhang.
Lekala la puso selegae le kgaogantswe ka bommasepala, bao ba tshwanetseng go tlhomiwa mo melelwaneng yotlhe ya Rephaboliki.
Khuduthamaga le bothati taolo jwa mmasepala bo rwelwe Khansele ya Mmasepala wa yona.
Mmasepala o na le tshwanelo ya go laola go ya ka pono ya yona, merero ya puso selegae ya baagi ba yona go tsamaelana le molao wa bosetšhaba le ya porofense, jaaka go rulaganyeditswe ke Molaotheo.
Puso ya bosetšhaba kgotsa ya porofense ga di a tshwanela go kgobelela kgotsa go kgoreletsa bokgoni jwa mmasepala kgotsa tshwanelo ya go diragatsa maatla a ona kgotsa go dira ditiro ya ona.
Maikaelelo a puso ya selegae ke –

item.p: go tlamela baagi ka puso e e gololesegileng le e e na leng maikarabelo;
go netefatsa gore baagi ba fitlhelela ditirelo ka dinako tsotlhe;
go godisa tlhabololo ya leago le ikonomi;
go godisa tikologo e e sireletsegileng le e e itekanetseng;
go rotloetsa go botsaya karolo jwa baagi le mekgatlho ya baagi mo mererong ya pusoselegae.

content.p: Mmasepala o tshwanela go kgaratlhela, go ya ka dithata tsa tšhelete le bokgoni jwa tsamaiso go fitlhelela maikaelelo a a tlhalositsweng mo karolotlaleletso (1).
Mmasepala o tshwanetse –

item.p: go rulaganya le go laola botsamaisi, tekanyetso, le go loga maano go beya kwapele ditlhokego tsa motheo tsa baagi, le ntshetsa pele tlhabololo ya loago le ikonomi ya baagi; le
go tsaya karolo mo Manaaneong a tlhabololo ya bosetšhaba le ya diporofense.

content.p: Puso ya bosetšhaba le ya porofense, ka molao le dikgato dingwe di tshwanetse thusa le go matlafatsa bokgoni jwa bommasepala go laola merero le ditiro tsa yona.

Molaotlhomo o o tshitsintsweng wa bosetšhaba kgotsa wa porofense o o amang maemo, ditheo, maatla kgotsa ditiro tsa pso ya selegae di tshwanela go phasaladiwa gore baagi ba kgone go tshwaela pele e tlhagisiwe mo Palamenteng kgotsa mo kgotlapeomolao ya porofense, ka mokgwa o o letlang puso selegae e e rulagantsweng, bommasepala, le batho bangwe ba ba na leng kgatlhego, ba tshwanetse go fiwa tšhono ya go dira ditlhagiso mabapi le Molaotlhomo.
Go na le magato a a latelang a bommasepala:

item.p: Legato la A: Mmasepala yo o na leng bothati jwa khuduthamaga le taolo ya molao mo kgaolong ya yona fela.
Legato la B: Mmasepala yo o aroganyang bothati jwa bokhuduthamaga le jwa taolo ya semolao mo kgaolong ya yona le mmasepala wa legato la C, yo o welang mo kgaolong ya ona.
Legato la C: Mmasepala yo o na leng bothati jwa bokhuduthamaga le jwa taolo ya semola molao mo kgaolong e akaretsang bommasepala ba ba fetang nngwe.

content.p: Molao wa bosetšhaba o tshwanetse go tlhalosa bommasepala ka go farologana, ba ba tshwanetseng go tlhamiwa go logato lenngwe lele nngwe.
Molao wa bosetšhaba o tshwanetse –

item.p: go tlhama dielo tsa go tlhomamisa fa kgaolo e tshwanetse go nna mmasepala wa legato A kgotsa fa e tshwanetse go nna mmasepala wa logato la B le C.
go tlhama dielo le dithulaganyo ya tlhomamiso ya melelwane ya bommasepala ke bothati jo bo ikemetseng; le

go dira ditaelo tse di amang kgaoganyo ya matla le ditiro fa gare ga bommasepala, fa kgaolo e na le bommasepala ba logato la B le C ka bobedi go tsamaelana le karolo 229. Kgaoganyo ya dimatla le ditiro gare ga mmasepala wa logato la B le mmasepala wa logato la C, mmasepala e ka farologana go ya ka kgaoganyo ya matla le ditiro gareng ga mmasepala o mongwe wa logato la B le mmasepala wa logat la C.

content.p: Molao o o tlhalositsweng karolotlaleletso (3) e tshwanetse go ela tlhoko botlhokwa jwa kaabo ya ditirelo ke mmasepala ka tekatekano le ka dinako tshotlhe.
Molao wa porofense e tshwanetse go tlhomamisa mefuta e farologaneng ya bommasepala e tshwanetseng go tlhamiwa mo porofenseng.

Puso nngwe le nngwe ya porofense e tshwanetse go tlhama bommasepala mo porofenseng ya yona ka tsela e e tsamaelanang le molao o o atlenegisitsweng go ya ka karolotlaleletso (2) le (3) le, ka molao kgotsa dikgato dingwe, e tshwanetse go –

item.p: go tlamela ka tshekatsheko le thuso ya pusoselegae mo porofenseng; le
go tlhabololo bokgoni jwa pusoselegae go kgontsha bommasepala go dira ditiro tsa bona le go tsamaisa merero ya bona.

p.remark: [Karolotlaleletso. (6A) ya Molaotheo wa Tlhabololo ya Boraro ya Molao wa 1998, le go tlosiwa ka k 2 ya Molaotheo ya Tlhabololo ya bolesome pedi ya Molao wa 2005.]

content.p: Puso ya bosetšhaba, go ya ka karolo 44, le dipuso tsa diporofense di na le taolo ya semolao le ya bokhuduthamaga go netefatsa tiro ya bommasepala ka botlalo tebang le merero e e tlhalositsweng mo lenaane la Mametlelelo 4 le 5, ka go laola tiragatso ya bothati jwa bommasepala go ya ka tlhaloso ya karolo 156(1).
Mmasepala o na le taolo ya bokhuduthamaga mabapi le, e bile o na le thata ya go tsamaisa –

item.p: merero ya puso selegae e e tlhalositsweng mo lenaane la Karolo B ya Mametlelelo 4 le karolo B ya Mametlelelo 5, ka taolo ya molao yabosetšhaba le wa porofense; le
morero mongwe le mongwe yo o abeetsweng mmasepala ka molao wa bosetšhaba kgotsa wa porofense.

content.p: Mmasepala o ka tlhama le go laola melawana ya mmasepala ka maikaelelo a go dira tiro ya mmasepala ka manontlhotlho; le

Ka taolo ya karolo 151(4), molawana o o kgatlhanong le molao wa bosetšhaba le wa porofense ga o na matla a go dirisiwa. Fa go nale kgotlhang ga reng ga molawana le molao wa bosetšhaba le wa porofense yo sa direng ka ntlha ya kganetsano e e tlhalositsweng mo karolo 149, molawana o tshwanetse go tsewa o na le boleng nako yotlhe fa molao eo e sa dirisiwe.

Puso ya bosetšhaba le ya diporofense di tshwanetse go abela ka tumelano le go tsamaelana le lebaka lengwe lengwe Mmasepala taolo ya morero o tlhalositsweng mo karolo A ya Mametlelelo 4 kgotsa karolo A ya Mametlelelo 5 e e amang puso selegae, fa –

item.p: morero oo o ka tsamaisiwa ka manontlhotlho ke puso selegae; le
Mmasepala a na le bokgoni jwa go o diragatsa.

content.p: Mmasepala o na le tetla ya go diragatsa thata ngwe le ngwe tebang le morero o o botlhokwa, kgotsa o o maleba le, tiragatso ya ditiro ka manontlhotlho.

section.heading: Sebopego le tlhopho ya Dikhansele tsa Mmasepala

content.p: Khansele ya Mmasepala e bopiwa ke –

item.p: ditokololo tse di tlhomilweng go ya dikarolotlaleletso (2) le (3); kgotsa
fa molao wa bosetšhaba o tlhomamisa jaalo –
ditokololo tse di tlhophilweng ke Dikhansele tse dingwe tsa Mmasepala go emela Dikhansele tseo; kgotsa;
ditokololo tsoopedi tse di tlhophilwe go ya ka temana (a) le ditokololo tse di tlhopilweng go ya ka temanatlaleletso (i) ya temana eno.

p.remark: [Kl(1) e emetswe ka k. 1(a) ya Molaotheo Tlhabololo ya Borobedi ya Molao wa 2002 le ka k. 3 ya Molaotheo Tlhabololo ya Bosometlhano ya Molao wa 2008.]

content.p: Go tlhophiwa ga ditokololo tsa Khansele ya Mmasepala go ya ka tlhaloso ya karolotlaletso (1)(a) di tshwanetse go tsamaelana le molao wa bosetšhaba, o o tshwanetseng go rulaganya tsamaiso –

item.p: wa boemedi ba kabelano bo bo ikaegileng mo karolong ya batlhophi ba mmasepala yoo ba ba mo lenaaneng le le lengwe la batlhophi, le le rulaganyeditsweng go kgethiwa ga ditokololo mo gare ga manaane a maina a bontlhopheng a a latelanang ka fa kgatlhegong ya lekoko; kgotsa
kemedi ya tekanyetso ya makoko go ya ka tlhaloso ya temana (a) e golagantswe le le kemedi ya dikgaolo, e e theilweng go tsamaelana le dikarolo tsa Mmasepala ya lenaneo la bosetšhaba la batlhophi.

content.p: Thulagano ya ditlhopho go ya ka karolotlaleletso (2), ka kakaretso e tshwanetse go tsamaelana le selekanyo sa kemedi diboutu.

p.remark: [Kl.(3) e emetswe ke k. 1(b) ya Molaotheo Tlhabololo wa Borataro wa Molao wa 2002.]

item.p: Fa thulaganyo ya ditlhopha e akaretsa boemedi jwa dikarolo, go kgaoganngwa ga dikarolo bo tshwanetse go diriwa ke bothati jo bo ikemetseng jo bo tlhophilweng ka mabaka, e bile bo diragatsa ka tsamaiso le tsela e e lhalositsweng go ya ka molao wa bosetšhaba.

p.remark: [Tema (b) e phimolwa ka k.3 ya Molaotheo Tlhabololo wa Bosomepedi wa Molao wa 2005.]
[Kl.(4) e emetswe ke k. 2 ya Molaotheo Tlhabololo wa Boraro wa Molaowa 1998.]

content.p: Motho a ka bouta mo Mmasepala fela fa motho yoo a kwadisitswe mo karolong ya Mmasepala yoo, mo lennane la batlhophi ba bosetšhaba.

Molao wa bosetšhaba o o tlhalositsweng mo karolotlaleletso (1)(b) e tshwanetse go tlhama thulaganyo e e letlang makoko le dikgatlhego tse di tlhagisitsweng mo Khanseleng ya Mmasepala e e thapang badiri, go nna le kemedi ka tekatekano mo Khansele ya Mmasepala e go thapiwang mo go yona.
Moagi mongwe le mongwe yo o mo maemomg a go boutela Khansele ya Mmasepala o na le tshiamelo ya go tlhophiwa go nna tokololo ya Khansele eo, ntle le –

item.p: mongwe le mongwe yo thapilweng ke, kgotsa yo o direlang Mmasepala, e bile a amogela moputso kgotsa tuelo boemong jwa tiro eo, e bile a sa ilediwago ya ka mabaka a molao wa bosetšhaba;

mongwe le mongwe yo thapilweng ke, kgotsa mo tirong ya Puso mo lekaleng le lengwe, e bile a amogela moputso kgotsa tuelo boemong jwa tiro eo, e bile a ileditswe go nna tokololo ya Khansele go ya ka mabaka a molao wabosetšhaba;
mongwe le mongwe yo o ileditsweng go boutela Ntlokokoano Bosetšhaba kgotsa yo ileditsweng go ya ka mabaka a karolo 47(1)(c), (d) kgotsa (e) go nna tokololo ya Ntlokokoano;

tokololo ya Ntlokokoano Bosetšhaba, kemedi ya Khansele ya Bosetšhaba ya Diporofense kgotsa tokololo ya kgotlapeomolao ya porofense; mme fela kiletso eo e sa ame tokololo ya Khansele ya Mmasepala e e emetseng puso-selegae mo Khanseleng ya Bosetšhaba; kgotsa
tokololo ya Khansele ya Mmasepala o mongwe; mme kiletso eo e sa ame tokololo ya Khansele ya Mmasepala, e e emetseng Khansele mo Khanseleng ya Mmasepala engwe ya logato le le farologaneng.

content.p: Motho yo o se nang tshiamelo ya go nna tokololo ya Khansele ya Mmasepala go ya ka mabaka a karolo (1)(a), (b), (c) kgotsa (d) le (e) e ka nna ntlhopheng wa Khansele go tsamaelana le dikiletso kgotsa mabaka a molao wa bosetšhaba.

p.remark: [Kl (3) e okeditswe ka k.4 ya Molaotheo Tlhabololo ya Bobedi wa Molao wa 2008.]

content.p: Paka ya Khansele ya Mmasepala ga ya tshwanela go feta dingwaga di le tlhano, go ya ka tlhomamiso ya molao wa bosetšhaba.

Fa Khansele ya Mmasepala e phatlaladiwa go ya ka molao wa bosetšhaba, kgotsa fa paka ya yona e fela, ditlhopho di tshwanetse go tshwariwa mo nakong ya matsatsi a le 90 go simolola ka letlha le Khansele e phatlaladitsweng ka lona kgotsa letlha la go fela ga paka ya yona.

Khansele ya Mmasepala, ntle le Khansele e e phatlaladitsweng ka ntlha ya thuso ya tsereganyo go ya ka karolo 139, e tswelela go nna le bokgoni jwa go dira go simolola ka nako e e phatlaladiwang ka yona, kgotsa ka nako ya go fela ga paka ya yona, go fitlha Khansele e ntšhwa e tlhophiwa semmuso.

p.remark: [Kl. 159 e emetswe ke k. 1 ya Molaotheo Tlhabololo wa Bobedi wa Molao wa 1998.]

content.p: Khansele ya ga Mmasepala –

item.p: e dira ditshwetso mabapi le tiragatso ya dithata tsotlhe le tiragatso ya ditiro tsotlhe tsa mmasepala;
e tshwanetse go tlhopha modulasetilo wa yona;
e tshwanetse go tlhopha komiti ya khuduthamaga le dikomiti tse dingwe go ya ka molao ya bosetšhaba;
e ka thapa badiri ba ba tshwanetseng go diragatsa ditiro tsa yona ka botlalo.

content.p: Ditiro tse di latelang ga di a tshwanela go dirwia ke Khansele ya Mmasepala:

item.p: katlanegiso ya melawana;
kamogelo ya ditekanyetsokabo;
tuelo ya makgetho, merokotso, makgethwana, dituelo;
koketso madi a kadimo.
Bontsi jwa maloko a Khansele ya Mmasepala a tshwanetse go nna teng pele go boutela morero mongwe le mongwe.
Dipotso tsotlhe mabapi le dintlha tse di tlhalosistsweng mo karolotlaleletso (b) di laolwa ke tshwetso e e dirilweng ke Khansele ya Mmasepala ka tumelano ya bontsi jwa diboutu tsa maloko a yona.
Dipotso tse dingwe tsotlhe tse di fa pele ga Khansele ya Mmasepala di amogelwa ka bontsi jwa diboutu tse di dirilweng.

content.p: Ga go molawana ope o o tshwanetseng go atlenegisiwa ke Khansele ya ga Mmasepala ntle le fa –

item.p: Maloko otlhe a Khansele a itsisitswe pele ga nako; le
Molawana o o tshitsingwang, o setse o phasaladitswe gore baagi botlhe ba kgone go tshwanelo.

content.p: Molao wa bosetšhaba o tshwanetse go tlamela ka tsela ya go tlhomamisa –

item.p: bogolo jwa Khansele ya Mmasepala;
fa Dikhansele tsa Mmasepala di na le bokgoni jwa go tlhopha Komiti ya Khuduthamaga kgotsa komiti enngwe; kgotsa
bogolo jwa komiti ya Khuduthamaga kgotsa komiti nngwe le nngwe ya Khansele ya Mmasepala.

content.p: Khansele ya Mmasepala e ka dira melawana e e tlhalosang melao le ditaelo boemong jwa –

item.p: Dithulaganyo tsa yona tsa mo teng;
Ditiro le ditsamaiso tsa yona;
Go tlhamiwa, sebopego, tsamaiso, dithata le ditiro tsa dikomiti tsa yona.

content.p: Khansele ya Mmasepala e tshwanetse go dira tiro ya yona mo pontsheng, e bile e ka tshwarela dikopano tsa yona mo sephiring, kgotsa tsa dikomiti tsa yona,fa fela go le matshwanedi go dira jalo go lebilwe bomasisi jwa morero o tshwerweng.
Maloko a Khansele ya Mmasepala a letleletswe go tsaya karolo mo ditsamaisong tsa yona le tsa dikomiti tsa yona ka mokgwa o –

item.p: letlelang makoko le batho ba ban a leng kgatlhego mo Khanseleng go nna le kemedi ka tekatekano;
go tsamaelana le demokerasi; le
o ka laolwa ka molao wa bosetšhaba.

content.p: Kgotlapeomolao ya porofense mo lenaanetsamaiso la molao wa bosetšhaba e ka tlamela ka ditetleleleo le ditshireletsego tsa Dikhansele tsa Mmasepala le ditokololo tsa yona.
Molawana wa Mmasepala o ka tsenngwa tirisong fa fela o setse o phasaladitswe mo Lokwalodikgang la semmuso la porofense e e maleba.
Lokwalodikgang la semmuso la porofense le tshwanetse go phasalatsa molawana wa Mmasepala fa mmasepala a kopa jaalo.
Melawana ya Mmasepala e tshwanetse go ka fitlhelelwa ke baagi botlhe.
Molao wa Palamente o amogetsweng go tsamaelana le tsamaiso e e tlhomamisitsweng o go ya ka karolo 76 o tshwanela –

item.p: go tlotla mekgatlho ya bosetšhaba le ya porofense e e emetseng bommasepala; le
go tlhomamisa tsamaiso eo puso ya selegae e ka –
rerisanang le puso ya bosetšhaba kgotsa ya porofense;
tlhopa baemedi go tsaya karolo mo mererong ya Khansele ya Bosetšhaba ya Diporofense; le
go tsaya karolo mo mererong e e tlhalositsweng mo molaong wa bosetšhaba go tsamaelana le karolo 221(1)(c).

p.remark: [K. 163(b) e emetswe ke k. 4 ya Molaotheo Tlhabololo wa Bosupa wa Molao wa 2001.]

content.p: Merero mongwe le mongwe yo o lebaganyeng le puso ya selegae, mme o sa tlhalosiwa mo Molaotheo, o tshwanetse go tlhalosiwa ka molao wa bosetšhaba kgotsa ka molao wa porofense mo lenaanetsamaiso la molao wa bosetšhaba.
Bothati taolo jwa boatlhodi jwa Rephaboliki bo tlhomilwe mo dikgotlatshekelo.
Dikgotlatshekelo di ikemetse ka botsona, e bile di laolwa fela ke Molaotheo le molao, o di tshwanetseng go o diragatsa ka go se tseye matlhakore le ntle le poifo, ditlhotlho, kgotsa kgobelelo.
Ga go na motho kgotsa sethwe sepe sa puso se se tla kgoreletsang tsamaiso ya dikgotlatshekelo.

Ditheo tsa puso, go ya ka peomolao le dikgato dingwe, di tshwanetse go thusa le go sireletsa dikgotlatshekelo go netefatsa go ikemela, go se tseye matlhakore, seriti, phitlhelelo le bokgoni ba dikgotlatshekelo.
Taelo kgotsa tshwetso e e filweng ke kgotlatshekelo e tlama batho botlhe le ditheo tsa puso fa e dirang gone.
Moatlhodimogolo ke molaodi wa dikgotlatshekelo, e bile o rwele maikarabelo a setheo le a go sekaseka dipeelo le maemo a tiragatso ya ditiro tsa dikgotlatshekelo tsotlhe.

p.remark: [Karolotlaleletso (6) tlaleleditswe ka k. 1 ya Molaotheo Tlhabololo wa Bolesomesupa wa Molao wa 2012.]

content.p: Dikgotlatshekelo ke –

item.p: Kgotlatshekelo ya Molaotheo;
Kgotlatshekelokgolo ya Boikuelo;

Kgotlatshekelokgolo ya Aforika Borwa, le kgotlatshekelokgolo ngwe le ngwe ya boikuelo e e ka tlhamiwang go tsamaelana le Molao wa Palamente go reetsa dikgetsi tsa boikuelo go tswa go kgotlatshekelo ngwe le ngwe ya maemo a a tshwanang le a Kgotlatshekelokgolo ya Aforika Borwa;
Dikgotlatshekelo tsa boMagiseterata;

Kgotlatshekelo ngwe le ngwe e e tlhomilweng kgotsa e e amogetsweng go tsamaelana le Molao wa Palamente, go akarediwa kgotlatshekelo ngwe le ngwe ya maemo a a tshwanang le a Kgotlatshekelokgolo ya Aforika Borwa kgotsa Dikgotlatshekelo tsa Magiseterata.

p.remark: [Dikarolotlaleletso (c) le (e) e emetswe ke k. 2 ya Molaotheo Tlhabololo wa Bolesomesupa wa Molao wa 2012.]

content.p: Kgotlatshekelo ya Molaotheo e na le Moatlhodimogolo wa Aforika Borwa, Motlatsa- Moatlhodimogolo, le baatlhodi ba bangwe ba le robongwe.

p.remark: [Kl.(1) e emetswe ke k. 11 ya Molaotheo Tlhabololo wa Borataro wa Molao wa 2001.]

content.p: Morero o o fa pele ga Kgotlatshekelo ya Molaotheo o tshwanetse go swediwa ke bonnye baatlhodi ba le robedi.
Kgotlatshekelo ya Molaotheo –

item.p: ke kgotlatshekelo e e kwa godimo ya Rephaboliki; e bile;
e ka dira tshwetso
ka ga merero ya Molaotheo; le

morero mongwe le mongwe, fa Kgotlatshekelo ya Molaotheo e atlanegisa tumelo ya go dira boikuelo ka ga mabaka tlholang ngangisano go ya ka molao tebang le botlhokwa jwa baagi ka kakaretso, e bile e tshwanetse go sekasekwa ke Kgotlatshekelo eo, le
e dira tshwetso ya bofelo go sa nyatswe le fa morero o wela ka fa tlase ga maatlataolo a yona.

p.remark: [Karolotlaleletso (3) e emetswe ke k. 3 ya Molaotheo Tlhabololo wa Bolesomesupa wa Molao wa 2012.]

content.p: Ke kgotlatshekelo ya Molaotheo fela e ka –

item.p: swetsang dikgotlhang magareng ga ditheo tsa puso mo lekaleng la bosetšhaba kgotsa la porofense tse di amanang le maemo a Molaotheo, dithata kgotsa ditiro tsa ditheo dingwe le dingwe tsa puso;
swetsang ka bomolaotheo ba Molaotlhomo mongwe le mongwe wa palamente kgotsa porofense, mme e ka dira jalo fela mo mabakeng a a solofetsweng mo karolong 79 kgotsa 121;
swetsang dikopo tse di solofelwang mo karolong 80 kgotsa 122;
swetsang ka ga bomolaotheo ba tlhabololo nngwe le nngwe go Molaotheo;
tlhomamisang gore Palamente kgotsa Poresidente o paletswe ke go dira ka fa Molaotheong; kgotsa
go tlhomamisa Molaotheo wa porofense mo mabakeng a karolo 144.

content.p: Kgotlatshekelo ya Molaotheo e dira tshwetso ya makgaolakgang go netefatsa fa molao wa Palamente, molao wa Porofense kgotsa maitshwaro a Moporesidente a tsamaelana le molaotheo, e bile e tshwanetse go netefatsa taelo nngwe le nngwe e e sa tsamaelaneng le molao e e dirilweng ke Kgotlatshekelokgolo ya Boikuelo, Kgotlatshekelekgolo ya Aforika Borwa kgotsa Kgotlatshekelokgolo ya maemo a a tshwanang pele ga tiragatso ya taelo eo.

p.remark: [Karolotlaleletso (5) e emetswe ke k. 3 ya Molaotheo Tlhabololo Bolesomesupa wa Molao wa 2012.]

content.p: Peomolao ya bosetšhaba kgotsa melawana ya Kgotlatshekelo ya Molaotheo e tshwanetse go letla motho, fa e le mo kgatlegong ya bosiamisi le ka tetla ya Kgotlatshekelo ya Molaotheo –

item.p: go tlisa morero ka tlhamalalo kwa Kgotlatshekelong ya Molaotheo;
go dira boikuelo ka tlhamalalo kwa Kgotlatshekelong ya Molaotheo go tswa kwa Kgotlatshekelong nngwe le nngwe.

content.p: Morero wa molaotheo o akaretsa ntlha nngwe le nngwe e e amang thanolo, tshireletso kgotsa tiragatso ya Molaotheo.
Kgotlatshekelokgolo ya Boikuelo e na le Poresidente, Motlatsa Poresidente le palo ya baatlhodi ba boikuelo e e tlhomamisiwang ka Molao wa Palamente.

p.remark: [Kl.(1) e emetswe ke k. 12 ya Molaotheo Tlhabololo wa Borataro wa Molao wa 2001.]

content.p: Morero o o fa pele ga Kgotlatshekelokgolo ya Boikuelo o tshwanetse go swetswa ke palo ya baatlhodi e e tlhomamisitsweng ke Molao wa Palamente.

p.remark: [Kl.(2) e emetswe ke k. 12 ya Molaotheo Tlhabololo wa Borataro wa Molao wa 2001.]

item.p: Kgotlatshekelokgolo ya Boikuelo e ka dira tshwetso ya boikuelo ka ga morero mongwe le mongwe yo o tlhagang kwa Kgotlatshekelokgolo ya Aforika Borwa kgotsa kgotlatshekelo ya maemo a a tshwanang le a Kgotlatshekelokgolo ya Aforika Borwa, ntle le merero ya badiri le ya kgwebelano go tsamaelana le tlhomamiso e e dirilweng ka Molao wa Palamente.
Kgotlatshekelokgolo ya Boikuelo e ka dira tshwetso fela; ka—
dikgetsi tsa boikuelo;
dintlha tse di amang boikuelo; le
morero mongwe le mongwe yo e ka o romelwang go tsamaelana le mabaka a a tlhalositsweng ke Molao wa Palamente.

p.remark: [Karolotlaleletso (3) e emetswe ke k. 4 ya Molaotheo Tlhabololo wa Bolesomesupa wa Molao wa 2012.]

content.p: Kgotlatshekelokgolo ya Aforika Borwa e ka dira tshwetso—

item.p: ka ga morero mongwe le mongwe ntle le morero yo –
Kgotlatshekelo ya Molaotheo e dirileng tshwetso ya gore o tlhagelela fa pele ga yona ka tlhamalalo go ya ka karolo 167(6)(a); kgotsa
e rometswe go ya ka Molao wa Palamente go kgotlatshekelo e nngwe ya maemo a tshwanang le a Kgotlatshekelokgolo ya Aforika Borwa; le
morero mongwe le mongwe yo o sa tshwanelang go romelwa go Kgotlatshekelo e nngwe go ya ka Molao wa Palamente.

content.p: Kgotlatshekelokgolo ya Aforika Borwa e kgaogantswe ka Makala go ya ka Molao wa Palamente, Molao o o tshwanetseng go tlamela ka-

item.p: go tlhamiwa ga Makala, setheo se le nosi kgotsa tse pedi mo gare ga Lekala; le
taelo ya maatlataolo ya Lekala kgotsa setheo fa gare ga Lekala.

content.p: Lekala lengwe le lengwe la Kgotlatshekelokgolo ya Aforika Borwa-

item.p: le nale Moatlhodimogolo;
le ka nna le Motlatsa Moatlhodimogolo a le nosi kgotsa go feta; le
na le palo ya baatlhodi ba banngwe go ya ka tlhomamiso ya molao wa bosetšhaba.

p.remark: [KI 169 e emetswe ke k. 5 ya Molaotheo Tlhabololo wa Bolesomesupa wa Molao wa 2012.]

content.p: Dikgotlatshekelo tsotlhe ntle le tse di tlhalositsweng mo dikarolotlaleletso 167, 168 le 169 di ka na tsa rarabolola morero mongwe le mongwe yo o tlhomamisitsweng ka Molao wa Palamente, mme kgotlatshekelo ya maemo a fa tlase go a Kgotlatshekelokgolo ya Aforika Borwa ga di a tshwanela go atlhatlha merero kgotsa taelo ya bomolaotheo jwa molao mongwe le mongwe kgotsa maitshwaro mangwe le mangwe a Moporesidente.

p.remark: [KI 170 e emetswe ke k. 6 ya Molaotheo Tlhabololo wa Bolesomesupa wa Molao wa 2012.]

content.p: Dikgotlatshekelo tsotlhe di dira mo mabakeng a peomolao ya bosetšhaba, mme melawana le dithulaganyo tsa yona di tshwanetse go rulaganyediwe mo mabakeng a peomolao ya bosetšhaba.

section.heading: Maatla a Dikgotlatshekelo mo mabakeng a molaotheo

content.p: Fa e sekaseka morero wa molaotheo o o mo taolong ya yona, Kgotlatshekelo –

item.p: e tshwanetse ya tlhomamisa gore molao mongwe le mongwe kgotsa maitsholo a a sa tsamaisaneng le Molaotheo ga a na boleng go ya ka go sa tlhomamang ga ona; e bile
e ka dira taelo nngwe le nngwe e e tshiamo le tekatekano, go akarediwa –
taelo e e ngotlang boleng jwa tlhomamiso ya go tlhoka boleng e e direlang kwa morago; le
taelo e e sekegang taelo ya go sa tlhomamang mo nakong nngwe le nngwe le mo mabakeng mangwe le mangwe, go letla bothati bo bo nonofileng go siamisa phoso.

Kgotlatshekelokgolo ya Boikuelo, Kgotlatshekelokgolo ya AforikaBorwa kgotsa Kgotlatshekelo ya maemo a a tshwanang e ka dira taelotebang le boleng ba bomolaotheo ba molao wa Palamente, kgotsa molao waPorofense, kgotsa maitsholo mangwe le mangwe a Moporesidente, mme taeloe e mabapi le go tlhoka boleng jwa molaotheo ga e na maatla a tiragatsontle le fa e dumetswe ke Kgotlatshekelo ya Molaotheo.

p.remark: [Tema (a) e emetswe ke k. 7 ya Molaotheo Tlhabololo wa Bolesomesupa wa Molao wa 2012.]

item.p: Kgotlatshekelo e e dirang taelo ya go tlhoka boleng ga molaotheo e ka neela thibelo ya nakwana kgotsa kimologo nngwe ya nakwana go lekoko kgotsa e ka emisa ditsamaiso nakwana, go letetswe tshwetso ya kgotlatshekelo yaMolaotheo ka ga boleng ba Molao oo kgotsa maitsholo ao.
Peomolao ya bosetšhaba e tshwanela go rulaganyetsa thomelo ya taelo ya go tlhoka boleng ba molaotheo go Kgotlatshekelo ya Molaotheo.
